Episodes.Name: Emergence
Episodes.Description: John meets his new partner and discovers secrets in his own memory; Kwan wants to continue her people's fight for independence, but Soren has different plans for her; Makee's plan to retrieve the Madrigal object has deadly consequences.

Episodes.Name: Homecoming
Episodes.Description: Guided by his visions, John takes Halsey and Cortana back to where it all began, looking for answers from his past. With Soren along for protection, Kwan goes in search of an army.

Episodes.Name: Reckoning
Episodes.Description: On the run and out of options, Kwan and Soren have a difference of opinion. With the possibility of finding the mysterious Halo on everyone's minds, John makes a horrible discovery. And the war rears its ugly head.

Episodes.Name: Solace
Episodes.Description: Survivors of the battle with the Covenant return to Reach. John confronts Dr. Halsey and her lies. The new prisoner seems to know John better than he knows himself. The mysterious artifact shows John something startling.

Episodes.Name: Inheritance
Episodes.Description: Kwan's journey to uncover her family's "true purpose" takes her deep into the deserts of Madrigal. Søren obsesses over unfinished business.

Episodes.Name: Allegiance
Episodes.Description: John and Makee come to terms with their shared vision. Halsey has one last chance to save her mission, and herself. As things come to a head, everyone must choose a side.

Episodes.Name: Transcendence
Episodes.Description: Beaten, battered, and betrayed, John 117 leads the Spartans on a suicide mission to find the Halo and save humanity.

Name: Halo
Summary: Aliens threaten human existence in an epic 26th-century showdown.

Trailers.Title: Halo The Series (2022) | Official Trailer | Paramount+
Trailers.Description: HaloTheSeries #MasterChief #ParamountPlus Dramatizing an epic 26th-century conflict between humanity and an alien threat ...

Trailers.Title: Halo The Series (2022) | Official Trailer 2 | Paramount+
Trailers.Description: Dramatizing an epic 26th-century conflict between humanity and an alien threat known as the Covenant, Halo the series will ...

Trailers.Title: Halo The Series (2022) | First Look Trailer | Paramount+
Trailers.Description: Dramatizing an epic 26th-century conflict between humanity and an alien threat known as the Covenant, Halo the series will ...

Episodes.Name: Forest
Episodes.Description: In a covert Romanian facility, Erik Heller evades security to rescue baby Hanna. 15 years on, father and daughter live deep in the Polish forest. Erik has trained Hanna to be an incredible killer and hunter. Yet, keen to grow beyond the boundaries of her isolated world, she begins to venture away from home. This attracts the attention of CIA agent Marissa Wiegler, who has hunted Hanna since birth.

Episodes.Name: Friend
Episodes.Description: Hanna befriends a vacationing family and in short order is exposed to the indulgences of teen life she had been deprived of. Her father, Eric, continues on a journey to eventually meet up with Hanna.

Episodes.Name: City
Episodes.Description: Hanna and Erik are finally reunited in Berlin, where he introduces her to his old army friends and allies. As they hide out in a disused military bunker, planning their next step, Hanna begins to learn more about her father's past. However, having glimpsed a normal family life with Sophie, she becomes increasingly frustrated at her own and at the restrictions Erik imposes on her. Meanwhile, having tracked them down to Berlin with the help of Jacobs, Marissa and her CIA colleague Meisner arrive in the city. They begin to delve into Erik's past, seeking old connections ...

Episodes.Name: Father
Episodes.Description: Erik is holding Marissa prisoner in a disused water tower, trying to negotiate a deal to get him and Hanna safely out of Berlin. Jacobs attempts to track Marissa down but quickly discovers who has the upper hand. Meanwhile, Hanna hides out with Dieter and his family, much to the concern of Dieter's wife Sima. Desperate to know more about what her father is up to, Hanna follows Dieter on a nocturnal trip to the water tower. In doing so she begins to learn that there is more about Erik's past than he has been telling her. As Erik's escape plan begins to come together, ...

Episodes.Name: Town
Episodes.Description: Still reeling from her revelations about Erik, Hanna hides out in suburban London with Sophie who is keeping her new friend secret from her parents. Sophie is housing Hanna in the family caravan in a nearby garage. Concerned at Hanna's grief-like state, Sophie persuades her to attend a school party, where Hanna meets Sophie's friends including a very cute boy named Anton, who she quickly realises Sophie also feels very strongly about. Meanwhile, unable to go to the hospital for fear of capture, Erik's friends desperately try to save him from the life-threatening ...

Episodes.Name: Mother
Episodes.Description: Sophie and Hanna's relationship begins to turn sour over their shared interest in Anton. In the fallout from this argument, Marissa arrives at Sophie's house pretending to be Hanna's mother. Hanna finds herself torn between endangering Sophie and her family, or giving up her own freedom and going with Marissa. Meanwhile, a captured Erik is brutally interrogated by Sawyer and his men.

Episodes.Name: Road
Episodes.Description: Realising that Hanna will no longer accept anything but the full truth, Erik takes her back to Romania so she can learn more about who she is. As the two journey across Europe, their travels take them through places from Erik's past, bringing up old memories and bringing him and Hanna cautiously closer again. As they journey through Germany, they stop off at Erik's mother's home, where Hanna learns more about Erik's own background. Furious at still being kept out of the loop by Sawyer, Marissa refuses to stop searching for Erik and Hanna. In the process, she begins to...

Episodes.Name: Utrax
Episodes.Description: When Erik reveals to Hanna the truth about Utrax, she is determined to take action. Meanwhile, Marissa attempts to find out from Sawyer what has really been going on at the facility.

Episodes.Name: Safe
Episodes.Description: Deep in the Romanian forest, Hanna and Clara can taste their freedom. Hanna persuades Clara to remove her Utrax drug-implant and to banish her past identity. Clara seems content. But when they raid a holiday cabin and Clara finds a photograph of a mother and daughter, the image stirs something deep within her: a desire to find her own biological mother. The remaining trainees are transported to The Meadows, where they are introduced to their group leaders, Leo Garner and Joanna McCoy, and assigned identities to help them assimilate into society - a task overseen by ...

Episodes.Name: The Trial
Episodes.Description: Marissa returns to Paris with Hanna, feeling tense. She knows she is being followed. Suspicious of her office replacement, Sonia Richter, who is reporting directly to Carmichael, Marissa gives Hanna a complete makeover before arranging for her to start a new life with an old teacher in the Canadian wilderness. Meanwhile over at The Meadows, Clara's implant is replaced and she is brought up to speed by Leo, who informs her that Hanna is dead, and her only future is now here. Her new name is Clemency, and her fellow trainees will welcome her with open arms. Clara begins...

Episodes.Name: To the Meadows
Episodes.Description: At Hanna's request, Marissa agrees to help save Clara from The Meadows and arranges a passport for her, so that she can join Hanna in Canada. Hanna returns to Passway, where she locates Dumont's car and follows him as he leaves in a stolen vehicle. Marissa discovers that Sonia isn't in the office and instantly she is suspicious. She calls Sonia and traces her call to Belgium - she's here, after them - Sonia finds Monica, the trialist that Hanna posed as earlier, and she confirms that it was Hanna who took her place. At The Meadows, Carmichael deduces that someone must...

Episodes.Name: Welcome Mia
Episodes.Description: The morning after her beating, Marissa wakes to a call from Carmichael, informing her that Hanna is at The Meadows. They arrange to meet at a pick-up point in England. En route, Marissa sends her location to an unknown number before deliberately crashing her car in a bid to explain her bruises, hiding a transmitter at the site. Later at The Meadows, Marissa observes the inner functions of the Ops room and Carmichael asks Marissa to convince Hanna to join them. He needs her skills. Marissa secretly communicates to Hanna that she will help her escape if she goes along ...

Episodes.Name: A Way to Grieve
Episodes.Description: Following Marissa's failed break-out attempt, Carmichael accuses her of being involved in both Sonia and Sawyer's deaths and locks her in a cell at The Meadows' Staff Headquarters. Meanwhile, the other trainees attempt to help Hanna settle into life as 'Mia', but Hanna struggles, feeling as though she is betraying her real mother - and Erik. Hanna proves her worth to the programme by leading her team to victory in a military training exercise, during which she notices Mannion watching her from the external perimeter. Who is he? Afterwards, Hanna refuses to celebrate ...

Episodes.Name: You're With Us Now
Episodes.Description: Carmichael receives intel that a British journalist, Nicola Gough, and an internal source, codenamed 'Tacitus', are arranging to meet, and he informs Hanna and Jules that they are to embark on their first mission - to 'intercept' the journalist before she can meet with Tacitus. Marissa finds herself in Camp G, Morocco, where she is kept under close watch, whilst in London, Hanna and Jules, pose as university students at the London university where Nicola's partner, Bethany, works. Jules expertly manipulates Bethany into inviting them both to an event at her and ...

Episodes.Name: Tacitus
Episodes.Description: Following Nicola and Mannion's deaths, Hanna hides in a Heathrow airport, where she changes her appearance and flies out to Barcelona. Clara is handed a gun by a Utrax agent and ordered to kill Gelder and retrieve the target list. Gelder meets with his daughter, Kat, to try and convince her to leave the city with him as they are in danger. Sandy befriends an angered Kat and encourages her to talk to her father, in the hope that she might lead her and Clara to his whereabouts. Hanna lures Clara to an abandoned bullring, where she confronts Clara over her plot to murder...

Episodes.Name: The List
Episodes.Description: In Barcelona, Hanna, Clara and Kat trick their way into a villa in the hills, tying up the housekeeper, Raol. Carmichael arrives at Gelder's hotel whilst Marissa reaches the harbour with Grant. In order to retrieve the target list Gelder brought to Barcelona, Hanna arrives at Gelder's hotel in disguise. She corners Alba Paredes and attempts to recover Gelder's evidence. When Carmichael recognises her, a shootout ensues between Utrax guards and Hanna. Marissa arrives to help Hanna, who recognises Grant as one of Carmichael's men. Marissa covers for Hanna, who escapes ...

Episodes.Name: Résistance
Episodes.Description: Hanna returns to The Meadows with her cover as a loyal Utrax trainee intact thanks to John Carmichael, who leads the trainee program but has been coerced by Marissa to help. As the trainees prepare for their first missions, Marissa contacts a CIA analyst in Vienna who is on the target list, and uses him for information.

Episodes.Name: Grape Vines and Orange Trees
Episodes.Description: Hanna breaks protocol while Marissa's world is shattered when she recognizes The Chairman from Hanna's photo. As they both plan to sabotage the next assassination, a small mistake raises suspicion.

Episodes.Name: Nadiya
Episodes.Description: Hanna and Marissa move quickly now that they've been exposed. They plan to head to Vienna, believing it's the headquarters of Pioneer and home of the assassination program but Hanna first goes in search of Abbas.

Episodes.Name: Look Me In the Eye
Episodes.Description: Hanna and Marissa break into Pioneer headquarters and discover the frightening truth behind the assassination list and how it’s made. While inside, Marissa confronts Evans (aka The Chairman), leaving Hanna to escape with the evidence to bring down the program.

Episodes.Name: Eyeliner
Episodes.Description: Hanna and Marissa have nearly lost. Hanna is held captive by Evans while the evidence that Marissa has to bring down the program turns out to be encrypted and unusable. When Hanna tries to escape she finds what could be the key to bringing down Pioneer.

Episodes.Name: Do Not Sleep
Episodes.Description: Hanna and Marissa return to Pioneer headquarters as prisoners but with a mission to unlock the evidence they need to bring down the program. When they realize that Abbas and his daughter are in danger they race off to rescue them. In the forests outside Vienna, Hanna must save Abbas while Marissa confronts Evans one last time.

Name: Hanna
Summary: In equal parts high-concept thriller and coming-of-age drama, HANNA follows the journey of an extraordinary young girl raised in the forest, as she evades the relentless pursuit of an off-book CIA agent and tries to unearth the tr...

Episodes.Name: Starring Samuel Beckett, Albert Camus and Alois Alzheimer
Episodes.Description: A 44-year-old man is pressured to rebrand himself when his agency hires young creative directors.

Episodes.Name: Starring Marc Chagall, Abuela and Adolf Hitler
Episodes.Description: Thom gets a lesson in corporate America; the Swedes push a new campaign.

Episodes.Name: Starring Vladimir Nabokov, Hippocrates and God
Episodes.Description: Thom receives differing ideas on the meaning of suffering after Julius gets ill.

Episodes.Name: Starring Sigmund Freud, Charles Bukowski and Seven Billion A**Holes
Episodes.Description: Thom is overrun by jerks; the Swedes emasculate Thom at work; Julius is suspended.

Episodes.Name: Starring Josey Wales, Jesus Christ and the New York Times
Episodes.Description: When Thom misses a morning meeting, Gottfrid questions his priorities; Lee finds a new studio.

Episodes.Name: Starring Helen Keller, Moses and Lenny Bruce
Episodes.Description: Thom takes over a campaign and consoles Larry; Lee goes into a tailspin.

Episodes.Name: Starring David Ogilvy, Anton Chekhov and Gluten Enteropathy
Episodes.Description: Thom promises Julius he will return from Los Angeles with a toy; Lee gets a new cell phone.

Episodes.Name: Starring Rene Descartes, Adweek and HRH the Princess of Arendelle
Episodes.Description: Thom is forced out of his office; Lee meets Sandy while helping out as "lunch mom."

Episodes.Name: Starring Mr. Mike, Joseph McCarthy and Alfred Bernhard Nobel
Episodes.Description: Thom learns something terrible about Larry; Lee takes Julius to Hebrew School.

Episodes.Name: Starring Christopher Hitchens, Philip Larkin and Josef Stalin
Episodes.Description: Thom writes a story, and then quits his job; "Radical Capitalism"; hopes and dreams.

Name: Happyish
Summary: On his birthday, Thom Payne gets the gift of insignificance, and also a new boss. He suspects that his ED pills are interfering with his anti-depressants, leaving him with neither happiness nor... happiness. In a culture that reve...

Trailers.Title: HAPPYish Season 1 TRAILER | New Showtime Series
Trailers.Description: Happyish Season 1 Trailer - 2015 Showtime Series starring Steve Coogan Subscribe: ...

Trailers.Title: HAPPYish (2015) | Showtime Trailer HD

Trailers.Title: HAPPYish | 'A World Gone Mad' Tease | Season 1
Trailers.Description: Maybe, after 44 years on this ludicrous planet, settling for happyish is the best one can get. Starring Steve Coogan, Kathryn Hahn ...

Episodes.Name: Lyra's Jordan
Episodes.Description: Orphan Lyra Belacqua's world is turned upside-down by her long-absent uncle's return from the north, while the glamorous Mrs Coulter visits.

Episodes.Name: The Idea of North
Episodes.Description: Lyra starts her new life in London, determined to find Roger with Mrs Coulter's help. The Gyptians continue their search for the missing children and the elusive Gobblers.

Episodes.Name: The Spies
Episodes.Description: From the clutches of the Gobblers, Lyra finds help from an unlikely source, which helps her piece together more about her past and keep safe from the Magisterium.

Episodes.Name: Armour
Episodes.Description: As the Gyptians head up North, Lyra searches for allies and comes across an armored bear named Iorek Byrnison.

Episodes.Name: The Lost Boy
Episodes.Description: On their journey to the Station, Lyra and the Gyptians finally discover what the Gobblers have been doing to the missing children.

Episodes.Name: The Daemon-Cages
Episodes.Description: Lyra discovers the horrific truth behind the Gobblers' activities in the North. She must use all her wits to help free those around her and avoid suffering a terrible fate.

Episodes.Name: The Fight to the Death
Episodes.Description: Separated from her friends, Lyra must use all of her methods of deception to thwart a formidable foe. Meanwhile, Mrs Coulter plots her next move.

Episodes.Name: Betrayal
Episodes.Description: As the Magesterium closes in, Lyra learns more about Asriel's rebellion. But her assistance to him comes at a great personal cost.

Episodes.Name: The City of Magpies
Episodes.Description: Lyra and Will explore a new world. The Magisterium take action on past events. Lee Scoresby embarks on a mission.

Episodes.Name: The Cave
Episodes.Description: Lyra and Will head to Oxford for answers. The Magisterium is faced with a choice.

Episodes.Name: Theft
Episodes.Description: Lyra ignores the alethiometer's advice, leading to dangerous consequences.

Episodes.Name: Tower of the Angels
Episodes.Description: Will and Lyra make a plan, unaware of the dangers or the cost involved.

Episodes.Name: The Scholar
Episodes.Description: Will and Lyra set out to retrieve what's been lost. Mary takes a leap of faith.

Episodes.Name: Malice
Episodes.Description: Lyra and Will find allies who can help them in their search for Will's father. The Magisterium learn something shocking, and Mrs Coulter meets a formidable foe.

Episodes.Name: Æsahættr
Episodes.Description: As all paths converge on Cittàgazze, Lee is determined to fulfil his quest, whatever the cost. Mrs Coulter's question is answered, and Will takes on his father's mantle.

Episodes.Name: The Enchanted Sleeper
Episodes.Description: As Will searches for Lyra across worlds, Mrs. Coulter tests an unlikely new ally, while Asriel recruits for his war against the Authority.

Episodes.Name: The Break
Episodes.Description: As the Magisterium closes in on Mrs. Coulter, Will tries to help Lyra to safety. Asriel's base is rocked by unexpected visitors.

Episodes.Name: The Intention Craft
Episodes.Description: Lyra and Will seek help to fix Will's knife. Mrs. Coulter causes chaos at Asriel's republic.

Episodes.Name: Lyra and Her Death
Episodes.Description: Lyra and Will travel to a dangerous place from which no one has ever returned. Mrs. Coulter tries to thwart the Magisterium's deadly plan.

Episodes.Name: No Way Out
Episodes.Description: Will and Lyra journey into the Land of the Dead in search of Roger. Mrs Coulter risks everything to save Lyra.

Episodes.Name: The Abyss
Episodes.Description: Mrs Coulter and Lord Asriel team up and find clues to Lyra's whereabouts. Lyra and Will are determined to break Roger and the other ghosts out of the Land of the Dead.

Episodes.Name: The Clouded Mountain
Episodes.Description: During the battle for the Republic of Heaven, Lord Asriel and Mrs. Coulter encounter Metatron. Will and Lyra look for their daemons.

Episodes.Name: The Botanic Garden
Episodes.Description: Will and Lyra have to overcome their final obstacle and heal the worlds

Name: His Dark Materials
Summary: A young girl is destined to liberate her world from the grip of the Magisterium which represses people's ties to magic and their animal spirits known as daemons.

Trailers.Title: His Dark Materials: Season 1 | Official Trailer | HBO
