Episodes.Name: Episode #1.1
Episodes.Description: After being presumed dead, James Delaney resurfaces in London seeking revenge for the death of his father and inheriting the family shipping empire, which threatens the ambitions of his half-sister and the East India Company.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.2
Episodes.Description: Despite Delaney's return to London setting tongues wagging, he enlists allies in his quest to reclaim his legacy, while an unexpected arrival at the reading of the will disrupts his plans and reveals the nature of his inheritance.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.3
Episodes.Description: Delaney receives medical help from an unexpected source, before outwitting the East India Company, which turns its attentions to Delaney's new ally, Lorna.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.4
Episodes.Description: The plot against Delaney puts Lorna in danger, Delaney enlists help for a scheme of his own, and an invitation to an opulent ball leads to unexpected consequences.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.5
Episodes.Description: A duel at dawn takes a surprising turn, Zilpha is met with darkness, the East India Company is under investigation, and Delaney faces a race against time to keep his plot a secret.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.6
Episodes.Description: When his plot is betrayed and Zilpha takes drastic action against her husband, Delaney faces all out chaos, complicated further by a family revelation and the increasingly desperate East India Company.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.7
Episodes.Description: A tragic event leads to the betrayal of Delaney, who must use all of his wits and strength to salvage his plans.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.8
Episodes.Description: Delaney delivers an ultimatum, arrangements for immediate departure begin, while Strange has a final ace to play.

Name: Taboo
Summary: Adventurer James Keziah Delaney returns to London during the War of 1812 to rebuild his late father's shipping empire. However, both the government and his biggest competitor want his inheritance at any cost--even murder.

Episodes.Name: Life and Death
Episodes.Description: A child goes through a rite of passage with unexpected results.

Episodes.Name: Justice
Episodes.Description: Two Jedi are dispatched to resolve a kidnapping on a distant planet.

Episodes.Name: Choices
Episodes.Description: Jedi Knights investigate the mysterious death of one of their own.

Episodes.Name: The Sith Lord
Episodes.Description: A Jedi master makes a troubling discovery.

Episodes.Name: Practice Makes Perfect
Episodes.Description: A Jedi Padawan is given a seemingly impossible exercise.

Episodes.Name: Resolve
Episodes.Description: A former Jedi is faced with the truth that they cannot be something they are not.

Name: Tales of the Jedi
Summary: It showcases animated shorts that feature Jedi from the prequel era.

Trailers.Title: Tales Of The Jedi | Official Trailer | Disney Plus
Trailers.Description: Two Stories of Fate. One Destiny. #TalesOfTheJedi is coming to #DisneyPlus. All six Original shorts are streaming on October 26.

Trailers.Title: STAR WARS: Tales of the Jedi Trailer (2022)

Trailers.Title: TALES OF THE JEDI Trailer (2022) Star Wars Animated Series
Trailers.Description: TALES OF THE JEDI Trailer (2022) Star Wars Animated Series © 2022 - Disney+.

Episodes.Name: Chapter 1: Stranger in a Strange Land
Episodes.Description: Boba holds court.

Episodes.Name: Chapter 2: The Tribes of Tatooine
Episodes.Description: Boba faces new challengers on Tatooine.

Episodes.Name: Chapter 3: The Streets of Mos Espa
Episodes.Description: Boba must deal with two very different threats.

Episodes.Name: Chapter 4: The Gathering Storm
Episodes.Description: In the past, Boba Fett finds Fennec Shand wounded and unconscious in the desert. He saves her life and their partnership begins. Jumping forward, they have to deal with the treacherous Pyke clan.

Episodes.Name: Chapter 5: Return of the Mandalorian
Episodes.Description: An unexpected ally emerges.

Episodes.Name: Chapter 6: From the Desert Comes a Stranger
Episodes.Description: Mysteries are explored and Boba Fett learns new information.

Episodes.Name: Chapter 7: In the Name of Honor
Episodes.Description: Boba Fett and Fennec Shand face an escalating conflict.

Name: The Book of Boba Fett
Summary: Bounty hunter Boba Fett and mercenary Fennec Shand navigate the underworld when they return to Tatooine to claim Jabba the Hutt's old turf.

Trailers.Title: The Book of Boba Fett | Official Trailer | Disney+
Trailers.Description: Every galaxy has an underworld. Experience the new trailer for The Book of Boba Fett. The Original Series starts streaming ...

Trailers.Title: The Return | The Book of Boba Fett | Disney+
Trailers.Description: This month, return to the sands of Tatooine. The Book of Boba Fett, an all-new Original series, starts streaming December 29 on ...

Trailers.Title: Star Wars: The Book of Boba Fett - Official Trailer (2021) Temuera Morrison, Ming-Na Wen
Trailers.Description: The Book of Boba Fett, a thrilling Star Wars adventure teased in a surprise end-credit sequence following the Season 2 finale of ...

Episodes.Name: The Name of the Game
Episodes.Description: When a Supe kills the love of his life, A/V salesman Hughie Campbell teams up with Billy Butcher, a vigilante hell-bent on punishing corrupt Supes -- and Hughie's life will never be the same again.

Episodes.Name: Cherry
Episodes.Description: The Boys get themselves a Superhero, Starlight gets payback, Homelander gets naughty, and a Senator gets naughtier.

Episodes.Name: Get Some
Episodes.Description: It's the race of the century. A-Train versus Shockwave, vying for the title of World's Fastest Man. Meanwhile, the Boys are reunited and it feels so good.

Episodes.Name: The Female of the Species
Episodes.Description: On a very special episode of The Boys... an hour of guts, gutterballs, airplane hijackings, madness, ghosts, and one very intriguing Female. Oh, and lots of heart -- both in the sentimental sense, and in the gory literal sense.

Episodes.Name: Good for the Soul
Episodes.Description: The Boys head to the "Believe" Expo to follow a promising lead in their ongoing war against the Supes. There might -- MIGHT -- be a homicidal infant, but you'll have to see for yourself.

Episodes.Name: The Innocents
Episodes.Description: SUPER IN AMERICA (2019). Vought Studios. Genre: Reality. Starring: Homelander, Queen Maeve, Black Noir, The Deep, A-Train, Starlight, Tara Reid, Billy Zane.

Episodes.Name: The Self-Preservation Society
Episodes.Description: Never trust a washed-up Supe -- the Boys learn this lesson the hard way. Meanwhile, Homelander digs into his past, Starlight discovers that love hurts, and if you're ever in Sandusky, Ohio and a girl asks if she can touch your gills, say NO.

Episodes.Name: You Found Me
Episodes.Description: Season Finale Time! Questions answered! Secrets revealed! Conflicts... conflicted! Characters exploded! And so much more!

Episodes.Name: The Big Ride
Episodes.Description: With Butcher still missing, Hughie, Mother's Milk, Frenchie, and Kimiko are now fugitives, and Homelander and Vought are more powerful than ever. But just as the Boys are about to leave the country, they are pulled back into the fray.

Episodes.Name: Proper Preparation and Planning
Episodes.Description: Butcher is back with the Boys, but tensions flare with Hughie. Homelander spends quality time with his new "family." Starlight and Stormfront bond at a press junket and the Boys hunt down a super terrorist with a startling identity.

Episodes.Name: Over the Hill with the Swords of a Thousand Men
Episodes.Description: The Boys take to the high seas to safeguard their prisoner. Homelander plays house, then pushes Ryan over the edge. Starlight is forced to make an impossible choice. Stormfront reveals her true character.

Episodes.Name: Nothing Like It in the World
Episodes.Description: Milk, Hughie, and Annie go on a road trip to find Liberty. Frenchie has relationship problems, and Homelander continues to unravel.

Episodes.Name: We Gotta Go Now
Episodes.Description: Butcher has no more intentions to fight with Supes but Black Noir traced his location and found him: what will he do now? Supes are shooting a film named - #Dawn Of The Seven. Homelander is doing what Stormfront told him to do.

Episodes.Name: The Bloody Doors Off
Episodes.Description: When The Boys and Starlight follow a lead to Vought's mysterious Sage Grove Center, they find one of Vought's darkest secrets - and someone even darker from their past. Meanwhile Homelander and Stormfront's relationship deepens.

Episodes.Name: Butcher, Baker, Candlestick Maker
Episodes.Description: To help Victoria Neuman make a case against Vought, Mallory and The Boys look to an unlikely source for answers. Hughie gets terrifying news about Starlight. Meanwhile, Homelander and Stormfront further their master plan for Compound V.

Episodes.Name: What I Know
Episodes.Description: Becca shows up on Butcher's doorstep and begs for his help. The Boys agree to back Butcher, and together with Starlight, they finally face off against Homelander and Stormfront. But things go very bad, very fast.

Episodes.Name: Payback
Episodes.Description: You and a guest are invited to the premiere of DAWN OF THE SEVEN this Tuesday at 7PM in Vought Tower's Lamplighter Memorial Theater! Screening will be followed by a Q&A with director Adam Bourke and an after-party with Supe DJ Malchemical on the turntables! Join us for the greatest true origin story ever told about America's number one Superhero team and see how the legend began!

Episodes.Name: The Only Man in the Sky
Episodes.Description: Homelander, America's greatest Supe. Defending our shores from sea to shining sea. Today, America honors him on his birthday. Vought Shopping Network is celebrating by offering an exclusive Homelander Limited Birthday Edition Gold Coin.

Episodes.Name: Barbary Coast
Episodes.Description: Tonight at 9/8C on Vought Plus, it's the season finale of #AmericanHero. Three contestants remain, but only TWO will join #TheSeven. Will Starlight choose her old flame Supersonic? Or will someone else be moving into the Seven Tower?

Episodes.Name: Glorious Five Year Plan
Episodes.Description: The Boys search for a mysterious weapon in Russia while things are brewing behind the scenes at Vought. Plenty of trouble, gore and twists to foresee.

Episodes.Name: The Last Time to Look on This World of Lies
Episodes.Description: The Boys run into a major obstacle in their mission to stop the Seven and turn their attention to Soldier Boy. Homelander continues to make changes that fit his agenda at Vought International.

Episodes.Name: Herogasm
Episodes.Description: You’re invited to the 70th Annual Herogasm! You must present this invitation in order to be admitted! Same rules as always: no cameras, no non-Supe guests unless they sign an NDA and they’re DTF, and no telling any news media! It’s BYOD, but food, alcohol and lube will be provided! And please remember to RSVP so we can get an accurate headcount for the caterer!

Episodes.Name: Here Comes a Candle to Light You to Bed
Episodes.Description: Everything's changing as never expected for the Homelander. Soldier Boy is searching for the other old payback members to slay. Black Noir recollects what has really got him to the current situation.

Episodes.Name: The Instant White-Hot Wild
Episodes.Description: Calling all patriots! Let's show Homelander we've got his back and we're not going to let Starlight and her House of Horrors get away with trafficking children and drinking their adrenaline! It's time for real Americans to fight back! Join the Hometeamers and Stormchasers tomorrow at Vought Square! Stand back and stand by!

Name: The Boys
Summary: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Trailers.Title: THE BOYS (2019) Final Trailer | Karl Urban Superhero TV Series
Trailers.Description: Check out the official final trailer for the Amazon Prime Superhero Series Teh Boys starring IKarl Urban! Let us know what you ...

Trailers.Title: THE BOYS Trailer (NEW, 2019) Karl Urban, Superhero TV Series HD
Trailers.Description: THE BOYS Trailer (NEW, 2019) Karl Urban, Superhero TV Series HD © 2019 - Amazon Comedy, Kids, Family and Animated Film, ...

Trailers.Title: The Boys 2019 official Trailer - Action, Adventure, Comedy | TV Series
Trailers.Description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers. Creators: Evan Goldberg, Eric ...

Episodes.Name: Wolferton Splash
Episodes.Description: A young Princess Elizabeth marries Prince Philip. As King George VI's health worsens, Winston Churchill becomes Prime Minister for the second time.

Episodes.Name: Hyde Park Corner
Episodes.Description: With King George too ill to travel, Elizabeth and Phillip embark on a four-continent Commonwealth tour. Party leaders attempt to undermine Churchill.

Episodes.Name: Windsor
Episodes.Description: With Elizabeth in a new role, Phillip tries to assert some power. Churchill wants to delay the coronation. King George's disgraced brother arrives.

Episodes.Name: Act of God
Episodes.Description: When dense fog cripples London for days and creates a serious health hazard, Churchill's inaction leaves him vulnerable to his political enemies.

Episodes.Name: Smoke and Mirrors
Episodes.Description: Elizabeth rejects protocol by appointing Phillip to coordinate her coronation, but his ideas create conflict. The Duke of Windsor returns to London.

Episodes.Name: Gelignite
Episodes.Description: Margaret and Peter come to Elizabeth with a request. With a royal scandal about to break in the newspapers, the Queen Mother intervenes.

Episodes.Name: Scientia Potentia Est
Episodes.Description: As the Soviets test the H-bomb, both Churchill and Eden have major health crises. Angry about her inadequate education, Elizabeth hires a tutor.

Episodes.Name: Pride & Joy
Episodes.Description: Elizabeth and Phillip go on an exhausting world journey. Margaret takes over some of her sister's official duties and tries to liven things up.

Episodes.Name: Assassins
Episodes.Description: As tensions with Phillip increase, Elizabeth spends time with her old friend Porchey. Churchill's portrait is painted for his 80th birthday.

Episodes.Name: Gloriana
Episodes.Description: Margaret and Peter are reunited, but another obstacle stands in their way. Elizabeth is torn between her duty as Queen and her love for her sister.

Episodes.Name: Misadventure
Episodes.Description: As Philip leaves for a long tour, Elizabeth makes an upsetting discovery. Prime Minister Eden wants to strike back after Egypt seizes the Suez Canal.

Episodes.Name: A Company of Men
Episodes.Description: Elizabeth feels disconnected from Philip. Eden copes with international pressure and ill health. An interview stirs up harrowing memories for Philip.

Episodes.Name: Lisbon
Episodes.Description: Palace insiders try to prevent a scandal that could reflect poorly on Philip. Eden faces censure from his cabinet and the press.

Episodes.Name: Beryl
Episodes.Description: When Elizabeth and Philip throw a grand party for their 10th anniversary, both Margaret and the new Prime Minister experience romantic tribulations.

Episodes.Name: Marionettes
Episodes.Description: After Elizabeth makes a tone-deaf speech at a Jaguar factory, she and the monarchy come under public attack by an outspoken lord.

Episodes.Name: Vergangenheit
Episodes.Description: A secret World War II document opens Elizabeth's eyes to grim realities about a family member. The Duke of Windsor campaigns to re-enter public life.

Episodes.Name: Matrimonium
Episodes.Description: A letter from Peter Townsend spurs Margaret to make a bold proposal. Elizabeth has good news that causes complications for Margaret.

Episodes.Name: Dear Mrs. Kennedy
Episodes.Description: Inspired by Jackie Kennedy and against her government's wishes, Elizabeth takes an unconventional approach to resolving an issue in Ghana.

Episodes.Name: Paterfamilias
Episodes.Description: Philip insists that Prince Charles attend his alma mater in Scotland and reminisces about the life-changing difficulties he experienced there.

Episodes.Name: Mystery Man
Episodes.Description: A salacious government scandal hits close to home for Elizabeth and Philip. Elizabeth retreats to Scotland for the rest of a difficult pregnancy.

Episodes.Name: Olding
Episodes.Description: The royal family mourns the passing of Winston Churchill. The United Kingdom ushers in a new prime minister, the Labour Party's Harold Wilson whom Prince Philip and Queen Elizabeth hear might be a Soviet spy.

Episodes.Name: Margaretology
Episodes.Description: While Princess Margaret and Lord Snowdon visit the USA, the queen, at the bidding of Harold Wilson, asks them to make a side trip to Washington, D.C. to ask President Johnson for financial assistance for the United Kingdom.

Episodes.Name: Aberfan
Episodes.Description: A horrible disaster in the Welsh town of Aberfan leaves scores of children dead, but when the Queen takes a week to decide to visit the town to offer solace to its people, she must confront her reasons for postponing the trip.

Episodes.Name: Bubbikins
Episodes.Description: Left without a home by a political coup in Athens, Philip's eccentric mother, Princess Alice of Greece, is invited to live in Buckingham Palace by the Queen.

Episodes.Name: Coup
Episodes.Description: While the Queen travels abroad to learn about horse training, unhappiness among the British elite with the devaluation of the pound involves Lord Mountbatten in a plan to oust Harold Wilson.

Episodes.Name: Tywysog Cymru
Episodes.Description: Prince Charles is sent to Aberystwyth to learn Welsh from an ardent nationalist in preparation for the ceremony for his investiture as Prince of Wales.

Episodes.Name: Moondust
Episodes.Description: The 1969 moon landing occasions a mid-life crisis in Prince Philip, who thinks of the adventures he has missed as the Queen's consort.

Episodes.Name: Dangling Man
Episodes.Description: Charles visits the exiled Duke of Windsor in his Paris chateau, only to find him very ill. But will the Queen make peace with her uncle before he dies?

Episodes.Name: Imbroglio
Episodes.Description: While Princess Anne dates her elder brother's polo rival Andrew Parker Bowles, Prince Charles falls deeply in love with Camilla Shand causing the Queen Mother and Lord Mountbatten to interfere.

Episodes.Name: Cri de Coeur
Episodes.Description: As her marriage falls apart, Princess Margaret finds solace in the arms of a much younger landscape gardener. The Queen and the nation celebrate Elizabeth II's Silver Jubilee.

Episodes.Name: Gold Stick
Episodes.Description: As Elizabeth welcomes Britain's first woman prime minister and Charles meets a young Diana Spencer, an IRA attack brings tragedy to the royal family.

Episodes.Name: The Balmoral Test
Episodes.Description: Margaret Thatcher visits Balmoral but has trouble fitting in with the royal family, while Charles finds himself torn between his heart and family duty.

Episodes.Name: Fairytale
Episodes.Description: After Charles proposes, Diana moves into Buckingham Palace and finds her life filled with princess training, loneliness and Camilla Parker Bowles.

Episodes.Name: Favourites
Episodes.Description: While Margaret Thatcher struggles with the disappearance of her favorite child, Elizabeth reexamines her relationships with her four children.

Episodes.Name: Fagan
Episodes.Description: As Thatcher's policies create rising unemployment, a desperate man breaks into the palace, where he finds Elizabeth's bedroom and awakens her for a talk.

Episodes.Name: Terra Nullius
Episodes.Description: On a tour of Australia, Diana struggles to balance motherhood with her royal duties while both she and Charles cope with their marriage difficulties.

Episodes.Name: The Hereditary Principle
Episodes.Description: Grappling with mental health issues, Margaret seeks help and discovers an appalling secret about estranged relatives of the royal family.
As many nations condemn apartheid in South Africa, tensions mounts between Thatcher and Elizabeth about their clashing opinions on applying sanctions.

Episodes.Name: Avalanche
Episodes.Description: Charles is caught in a deadly avalanche, prompting both him and Diana to reevaluate their commitment to their troubled marriage.

Episodes.Name: War
Episodes.Description: Amid a growing challenge to her power, Thatcher fights for her position. Charles grows more determined to separate from Diana as their marriage unravels.

Episodes.Name: Queen Victoria Syndrome
Episodes.Description: A much-needed update to the Royal Yacht draws scrutiny to the Queen's reign. Hounded by the press, Charles and Diana have a second honeymoon in Italy.

Episodes.Name: The System
Episodes.Description: Prince Philip offers his support to a grieving family member. Keen to snatch a scoop, a tabloid journalist approaches Diana about a tell-all book.

Episodes.Name: Mou Mou
Episodes.Description: In 1946, an Egyptian street vendor finds inspiration in the abdicated King Edward. Years later, he eagerly tries to integrate into British High Society.

Episodes.Name: Annus Horribilis
Episodes.Description: Between a fire at Windsor Castle and tensions in her children's marriages, the Queen commemorates and reassesses her 40 years on the throne.

Episodes.Name: The Way Ahead
Episodes.Description: Faced with the fallout of an intercepted call with Camilla and the consequent kickback to his marriage, Prince Charles must navigate a scandal.

Episodes.Name: Ipatiev House
Episodes.Description: Eager to lead a newly democratic Russia, President Yeltsin tries to win the Queen's support while she navigates new rifts in her marriage with Philip.

Episodes.Name: No Woman's Land
Episodes.Description: As BBC's Martin Bashir goes to great lengths to secure an interview with Diana, the lonely princess finds purpose and warmth in a London hospital.

Episodes.Name: Gunpowder
Episodes.Description: The Queen spends quality time with Prince William. On Guy Fawkes Night, fireworks make for a perfect distraction from Diana's BBC interview.

Episodes.Name: Couple 31
Episodes.Description: The Princess of Wales contends with the repercussions of her statements. The Queen asks the Prime Minister for his help in a delicate family matter.

Episodes.Name: Decommissioned
Episodes.Description: After heightened public scrutiny, Charles forges a new alliance in Hong Kong. Mohamed Al-Fayed offers his support to a newly-divorced Diana.

Name: The Crown
Summary: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

Trailers.Title: The Crown | Official Trailer | Netflix
Trailers.Description: At a time when Britain was recovering from war and her empire was in decline, a young woman took the throne as a matter of duty ...

Trailers.Title: THE CROWN Season 1 TRAILER (2016) New Netflix Series
Trailers.Description: The Crown Season 1 Trailer - 2016 Netflix Series Subscribe: ...

Trailers.Title: The Crown | official trailer (2016) Netflix
Trailers.Description: official trailer for The Crown At a time when Britain was recovering from war and her empire was in decline, a young woman took ...

Episodes.Name: Dulcinea
Episodes.Description: In the asteroid belt near Saturn, James Holden and the crew of the ice freighter Canterbury, on its way to Ceres Station, investigate a distress call from an unknown derelict ship, the Scopuli.

Episodes.Name: The Big Empty
Episodes.Description: Holden and crew are trapped in a badly damaged shuttle. On Ceres, Miller uncovers clues about Julie Mao. On Earth, Chrisjen Avasarala questions a terrorist.

Episodes.Name: Remember the Cant
Episodes.Description: While Avasarala plays a dangerous game of politics, Holden and his crew are forced to turn on one another while held captive by the Martian Navy.

Episodes.Name: CQB
Episodes.Description: Holden and crew are caught in the middle of a desperate battle as mysterious war ships attack and board the Donnager. As Miller continues to investigate Julie Mao, his partner Havelock continues to go missing.

Episodes.Name: Back to the Butcher
Episodes.Description: The crew has survived the loss of the Canterbury and the Donnager and are contacted by an unlikely ally. Miller, on Ceres, continues his investigation and his thoughts of a conspiracy grow.

Episodes.Name: Rock Bottom
Episodes.Description: Holden's team makes an uneasy alliance with Fred Johnson while Miller fights for his life against Anderson Dawe's thugs.

Episodes.Name: Windmills
Episodes.Description: Holden and crew realize that they're not alone on the Rocinante and find themselves up against a Martian Marine blockade. Miller's dark night of the soul, believing all is lost, finds a new reason to keep going. Avasarala visits Holden's family in Montana.

Episodes.Name: Salvage
Episodes.Description: A derelict vessel holds a potentially devastating secret. Holden and his crew cross paths with Miller on Eros. Avasarala receives bad news.

Episodes.Name: Critical Mass
Episodes.Description: A flashback to Julie's origin story reveals her trajectory. Holden and Miller finally meet and team up to get to the bottom of the strange emergency situation happening on Eros. As the true horror of the events on Eros is revealed, an ailing Holden and Miller must overcome incredible odds if they hope to live to fight another day. Part 1 of 2

Episodes.Name: Leviathan Wakes
Episodes.Description: A flashback to Julie's origin story reveals her trajectory. Holden and Miller finally meet and team up to get to the bottom of the strange emergency situation happening on Eros. As the true horror of the events on Eros is revealed, an ailing Holden and Miller must overcome incredible odds if they hope to live to fight another day. Part 2 of 2

Episodes.Name: Safe
Episodes.Description: Unlikely allies Joe Miller and the crew of the Rocinante led by Jim Holden uncover more about the conspiracy to release the proto-molecule on Eros station.

Episodes.Name: Doors & Corners
Episodes.Description: Holden and crew stage a dangerous raid in search of information about the protomolecule.

Episodes.Name: Static
Episodes.Description: Holden and Miller butt heads about how the raid was handled.

Episodes.Name: Godspeed
Episodes.Description: Miller devises a dangerous plan to eradicate what's left of the protomolecule on Eros.

Episodes.Name: Home
Episodes.Description: The asteroid Eros takes direct collision course towards Earth. The Rocinante chases it. As last defense Earth launches missiles against Eros. Miller went inside Eros and makes a surprising discovery.

Episodes.Name: Paradigm Shift
Episodes.Description: Earth is planning an expedition to the point of Eros impact. Chrisjen conflicts with Sadavir about Jules-Pierre Mao. Col. Frederick Lucius Johnson improves his position in unexpected way. New battleground is opening.

Episodes.Name: The Seventh Man
Episodes.Description: Draper struggles with what happened on Ganymede while the coming Earth/Mars peace conference tighten the tension on Errinwright. Dawes confronts Fred Johnson about what the OPA's course of action should be regarding the protomolecule.

Episodes.Name: Pyre
Episodes.Description: Naomi tracks down signs of protomolecule and Fred Johnson's control over OPA collapses.

Episodes.Name: The Weeping Somnambulist
Episodes.Description: Bobbie becomes a pawn in a struggle between Earth and Mars.

Episodes.Name: Cascade
Episodes.Description: Holden leads his crew through the war-torn station on Ganymede.

Episodes.Name: Here There Be Dragons
Episodes.Description: Bobbie makes a decision that changes her life forever.

Episodes.Name: The Monster and the Rocket
Episodes.Description: A discovery pushes Naomi and Holden apart and sets the Roci crew against each other.

Episodes.Name: Caliban's War
Episodes.Description: In the final episode of this season, the crew of the Rocinante comes face to face with an evolving intelligence infused with the alien protomatter.

Episodes.Name: Fight or Flight
Episodes.Description: The crew has to deal with Naomi's betrayal while caught in a war between Earth and Mars. Avasarala and Bobbie hatch up an escape plan.

Episodes.Name: IFF
Episodes.Description: The Rocinante answers an unexpected distress signal. Bobbie and Avasarala find themselves being hunted by a mysterious captor. UN Secretary-General Sorrento-Gillis brings in a colleague from his past to lend an ear during this crucial time of war.

Episodes.Name: Assured Destruction
Episodes.Description: Earth strategizes a costly ploy to gain advantage in the war against Mars; Anna struggles to convince Sorrento-Gillis to do the right thing; Avasarala and Bobbie seek refuge aboard the Rocinante.

Episodes.Name: Reload
Episodes.Description: The Rocinante tends to wounded Martian soldiers in exchange for supplies; Avasarala struggles with how to disseminate a key piece of evidence despite being in hiding.

Episodes.Name: Triple Point
Episodes.Description: The search for Prax's daughter comes to a head; officers loyal to Admiral Souther plan to mutiny aboard the Agatha King.

Episodes.Name: Immolation
Episodes.Description: The final battle between Earth and Mars threatens the very future of humanity; a new monster is unleashed on Prospero Station; Anna receives the smoking gun she needs.

Episodes.Name: Delta-V
Episodes.Description: All eyes turn to the edge of the solar system as a mysterious new presence emerges; Naomi recommits to her roots; Drummer butts heads with a seasoned new commander aboard the Behemoth; and a young Belter makes a name for himself.

Episodes.Name: It Reaches Out
Episodes.Description: An old friend taunts Holden with the answers he seeks; Naomi struggles to fit in; a mysterious low-level tech aboard the Thomas Prince enacts a terrifying plan.

Episodes.Name: Intransigence
Episodes.Description: The Rocinante seeks a new game plan as they attempt to avoid capture; Melba's true motives are revealed; Naomi is torn between identity and ideal; Anna seeks a way to stay aboard the Thomas Prince.

Episodes.Name: Dandelion Sky
Episodes.Description: Holden sees past, present, and future; a ghost from Melba's past threatens her mission; Bobbie struggles to trust an old friend as she leads a group into uncharted territory.

Episodes.Name: Fallen World
Episodes.Description: Drummer and Ashford find themselves trapped with few options for survival; Anna tends to the wounded masses as Melba continues to hunt down her prey; the Rocinante crew struggles to survive as Naomi reunites with her true family.

Episodes.Name: Congregation
Episodes.Description: Wounded survivors arrive at the Behemoth. Holden and Ashford have a conversation. Holden tries to come to grips with what he has seen and tries to find out what is going on with the Station.

Episodes.Name: Abaddon's Gate
Episodes.Description: Humanity's fate is on the line as Holden and his allies race against time to save the ring by countering the plan Ashford's team is implementing. A new chapter opens for humanity.

Episodes.Name: New Terra
Episodes.Description: With 1300 new worlds within reach, a new interplanetary "land rush" has begun. The UN charges the crew of the Rocinante to settle a land dispute on its new colony world "New Terra." Meanwhile, the OPA begins transitioning the Behemoth to become outpost and gatekeeper to humanity's new frontier.

Episodes.Name: Jetsam
Episodes.Description: Avasarala is blindsided while on a visit to Mars. The Roci crew continue their protomolecule investigation while tensions between the RCE and Belters reach a tipping point. Drummer and Ashford track down a terrorist.

Episodes.Name: Subduction
Episodes.Description: New alien threats emerge on Ilus as Naomi battles health challenges on the planet. Bobbie searches for a missing person on Mars. Avasarala faces a new challenge in the UN.

Episodes.Name: Retrograde
Episodes.Description: Drummer and Ashford confront a dangerous person from Naomi's past. Murtry hunts down a target. Bobbie makes a life-changing confession.

Episodes.Name: Oppressor
Episodes.Description: As tensions on Ilus reach a boiling point, Holden reveals a secret. Avasarala debates Nancy Gao while an emergency on the Roci forces Alex and Naomi into action.

Episodes.Name: Displacement
Episodes.Description: The Roci crew prepares for an incoming disaster on Ilus. Ashford and Drummer close in on an enemy within the Belt. Bobbie takes on a dangerous job.

Episodes.Name: A Shot in the Dark
Episodes.Description: Naomi and Alex work to keep the Barbapiccola in orbit amidst a power outage. Avasarala faces a tough decision. Holden and Elvi race to find a cure for a disease spreading on Ilus.

Episodes.Name: The One-Eyed Man
Episodes.Description: Avasarala faces fallout for the UN's military mission. Ashford and Drummer makes big decisions about their future within the OPA. A spreading illness on Ilus takes a toll on Amos. Alex and Naomi's attempt to rescue the Barb turns desperate.

Episodes.Name: Saeculum
Episodes.Description: Holden and Miller race to save Ilus. Murtry puts his endgame into motion, putting the Roci crew's lives at risk.

Episodes.Name: Cibola Burn
Episodes.Description: Ashford closes in on an enemy while uncovering a dangerous plot. Avasarala faces a crossroads in her personal and political life. The Roci crew works to reestablish life on Ilus in the wake of a deadly catastrophe.

Episodes.Name: Exodus
Episodes.Description: Holden tries to convince Fred Johnson to destroy the last sample of protomolecule. Naomi gets an important lead to her son. On Luna, Avasarala begins to hunt for Marco Inaros.

Episodes.Name: Churn
Episodes.Description: Holden and Fred deal with infiltrators on Tycho. Drummer's past comes back to haunt her. Amos returns to Baltimore. Alex and Bobbie's investigation on Mars leads to rogue soldiers.

Episodes.Name: Mother
Episodes.Description: Naomi comes face to face with Filip. Holden and Fred turn the tables. Avasarala closes in on Marco's plot.

Episodes.Name: Gaugamela
Episodes.Description: Marco's grand plan shocks Earth, Mars and the Belt.

Episodes.Name: Down and Out
Episodes.Description: Amos and Clarissa are trapped in a collapsed building. Naomi contends with her old family. Holden assembles a new crew on the Roci. Alex and Bobbie make a dangerous discovery in the Belt.

Episodes.Name: Tribes
Episodes.Description: Holden and the Roci go on the hunt. Amos and Clarissa seek shelter on a devastated Earth. Bobbie and Alex fight a desperate battle. Marco makes Drummer an offer she can't refuse. Avasarala returns to a position of power.

Episodes.Name: Oyedeng
Episodes.Description: Naomi makes a desperate attempt to save her son from Marco. On the Roci, Holden battles for the last sample of protomolecule.

Episodes.Name: Hard Vacuum
Episodes.Description: Amos returns to Baltimore with Clarissa. On Luna, Avasarala's alliances begin to shift. Alone and adrift, Naomi becomes a deadly lure.

Episodes.Name: Winnipesaukee
Episodes.Description: Amos, Clarissa, and a gang of thieves work together to leave Earth. Avasarala tries to head off a brutal military strike. Drummer's new family bonds are tested as Naomi's life hangs in the balance.

Episodes.Name: Nemesis Games
Episodes.Description: Holden and the Roci face off against Marco's forces and Drummer, while Alex and Bobbie attempt a dangerous rescue of Naomi, and the balance of power in the Solar System shifts.

Episodes.Name: Strange Dogs
Episodes.Description: The Rocinante crew make a startling discovery on an asteroid. Avasarala and Bobbie contend with the devastation on Earth. Drummer and her family must make a heartbreaking decision. On Ceres, Marco and Filip's struggles turn inward.

Episodes.Name: Azure Dragon
Episodes.Description: With an unexpected passenger aboard the Rocinante, Holden and crew undertake a dangerous mission that could shift the balance of power in the war. Drummer decides to make an uneasy alliance. Filip wrestles with his guilt.

Episodes.Name: Force Projection
Episodes.Description: Avasarala, with the Combined Fleet of Earth and Mars, takes the war to Marco. Filip and Marco's relationship is tested. The war becomes more perilous and personal for Holden and Naomi when the Rocinante is suddenly forced into a battle.

Episodes.Name: Redoubt
Episodes.Description: A controversial decision puts Holden at odds with his crew. On Ceres, Avasarala struggles to contain an escalating humanitarian crisis. Drummer's growing faction stage a daring raid. Filip makes an unexpected discovery.

Episodes.Name: Why We Fight
Episodes.Description: Drummer arrives on Ceres to aid the relief effort. Holden tries to convince Avasarala to release crucial information that might avert catastrophe. Amos and Bobbie get a little R&R. Naomi has a difficult and long-awaited reunion.

Episodes.Name: Babylon's Ashes
Episodes.Description: Inners and Belters fight side by side with the crew of the Rocinante in a last, massive, desperate battle with Marco and his Free Navy, with the fate of the Solar System, the Ring Gates, and of all humanity hanging in the balance.

Name: The Expanse
Summary: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.

Trailers.Title: The Expanse (Syfy) Comic-Con 2015 Trailer HD
Trailers.Description: 'The Expanse' follows the case of a missing young woman who brings a hardened detective, and a rogue ship's captain to expose ...

Trailers.Title: The Expanse Trailer
Trailers.Description: Thomas Jane stars as a detective in Syfy's upcoming series set 200 years in the future, after humans have colonized other worlds.

Episodes.Name: Offred
Episodes.Description: Offred, one of the few fertile women known as Handmaids in the oppressive Republic of Gilead, struggles to survive as a reproductive surrogate for a powerful Commander and his resentful wife.

Episodes.Name: Birth Day
Episodes.Description: June and her fellow Handmaids assist with the delivery of Janine's baby, prompting her to recall her own daughter's birth, and draws closer to Ofglen while dreading a secret meeting with the Commander.

Episodes.Name: Late
Episodes.Description: June visits Janine and her baby with Serena and remembers the early days of the revolution, before Gilead. Ofglen faces a difficult challenge.

Episodes.Name: Nolite Te Bastardes Carborundorum
Episodes.Description: Punished by Serena, June begins to unravel and reflects on her time with Moira at the Red Center.

Episodes.Name: Faithful
Episodes.Description: Serena makes June a surprising proposition, as June remembers the unconventional beginning of her relationship with Luke; Emily tries reintegrating into Gilead.

Episodes.Name: A Woman's Place
Episodes.Description: When a trade delegation from Mexico comes to Gilead, June discovers several shocking secrets.

Episodes.Name: The Other Side
Episodes.Description: Flashbacks show what happened to Luke after being separated from June and Hannah.

Episodes.Name: Jezebels
Episodes.Description: While his wife is away, Commander Waterford takes Offred on an excursion outside the walls of Gilead to a den of iniquity where she finds a familiar face.

Episodes.Name: The Bridge
Episodes.Description: June is tasked with going back to Jezebels to find a package. Meanwhile in Gilead, Janine has trouble relinquishing her newborn baby.

Episodes.Name: Night
Episodes.Description: Serena confronts June and Fred. June struggles with a complicated, life-changing revelation. The Handmaids face a brutal decision.

Episodes.Name: June
Episodes.Description: June reckons with the consequences of a dangerous decision while haunted by memories from her past and the violent beginnings of Gilead.

Episodes.Name: Unwomen
Episodes.Description: June adjusts to a new way of life, while in hiding in Boston. Emily reflects on her past as a new arrival disrupts life at the Colonies.

Episodes.Name: Baggage
Episodes.Description: June reflects on her relationship with her mother as she navigates her way through Gilead. In Little America, Moira tries to cope with the trauma she endured.

Episodes.Name: Other Women
Episodes.Description: A baby shower provokes a troubling shift in Offred's relationship with Serena Joy. Offred reckons with the choice she made that led her to become a Handmaid.

Episodes.Name: Seeds
Episodes.Description: Offred spirals as a Gilead ceremony disrupts her relationship with Nick. Janine tries to adjust to life in the Colonies, jeopardizing her friendship with Emily.

Episodes.Name: First Blood
Episodes.Description: Offred finds unexpected allies and obstacles in her search for a way to protect Hannah. The Commander prepares for the dedication of a new Red Center. Nick struggles with his new assignment.

Episodes.Name: After
Episodes.Description: An attack sends shockwaves through both Gilead and Little America; Serena makes a dangerous choice; Moira searches for someone from her past.

Episodes.Name: Women's Work
Episodes.Description: A sick baby tests Offred and Serena; Janine finally faces Naomi.

Episodes.Name: Smart Power
Episodes.Description: On a diplomatic trip abroad, Serena faces the temptation of life outside Gilead; Luke and Moira grapple with survivor's guilt; Offred seeks support from allies.

Episodes.Name: The Last Ceremony
Episodes.Description: A frustrated Serena becomes desperate; The Commander tries to make amends with Offred; Nick pushes Eden farther away; Offred is faced with an unexpected reunion.

Episodes.Name: Holly
Episodes.Description: Offred faces a grueling challenge alone as she recalls her life as a mother; Serena and the Commander deal with the fallout of their actions towards Offred.

Episodes.Name: Postpartum
Episodes.Description: Offred is sent to a familiar place; Nick is rocked by Gilead's brutal response to a crime; Emily is assigned to a mysterious new house.

Episodes.Name: The Word
Episodes.Description: Serena and the other Wives strive to make change; Emily learns more about her new Commander; Offred faces a difficult decision.

Episodes.Name: Night
Episodes.Description: June embarks on a bold mission with unexpected consequences; Emily and Nichole make a harrowing journey; The Waterfords reckon with Serena Joy's choice to send Nichole away.

Episodes.Name: Mary and Martha
Episodes.Description: June helps the Marthas with a dangerous task while navigating a relationship with her pious new walking partner; Emily and Luke struggle with their altered circumstances.

Episodes.Name: Useful
Episodes.Description: Serena Joy attempts to recuperate at her mother's home; Lawrence teaches June a hard lesson about the difficult decisions he makes as a Commander.

Episodes.Name: God Bless the Child
Episodes.Description: June negotiates a truce in the Waterfords' fractured relationship; Janine oversteps with the Putnam family; A still-healing Aunt Lydia offers a brutal public punishment.

Episodes.Name: Unknown Caller
Episodes.Description: June and Serena grapple with a new revelation about Nichole, leading to an incident that will have far-reaching ramifications.

Episodes.Name: Household
Episodes.Description: June makes an important connection as she attempts to protect Nichole while accompanying the Waterfords to Washington D.C., where a powerful family offers a glimpse of the future of Gilead.

Episodes.Name: Under His Eye
Episodes.Description: June escalates her risky efforts to find Hannah; Emily must face her past crimes; Serena and Fred contemplate their future in Washington.

Episodes.Name: Unfit
Episodes.Description: June and the rest of the Handmaids shun Ofmatthew, and both are pushed to their limit at the hands of Aunt Lydia, who reflects on her life and relationships before the rise of Gilead.

Episodes.Name: Heroic
Episodes.Description: Confined in a hospital, June's sanity begins to fray, but an encounter with Serena Joy forces June to reassess her recent actions.

Episodes.Name: Witness
Episodes.Description: Ready to strike back at her oppressors, June starts making arrangements for an ambitious plan, but a devious ploy on the part of Commander Waterford threatens to derail her.

Episodes.Name: Liars
Episodes.Description: A return to Jezebels puts everything in jeopardy; Serena Joy and Commander Waterford take a clandestine trip.

Episodes.Name: Sacrifice
Episodes.Description: Gilead leadership is rocked by losses of their own; Luke and Moira adjust to new arrivals in Canada; A tragedy strikes the Lawrence household.

Episodes.Name: Mayday
Episodes.Description: With her plan in place, June reaches the point of no return on her bold strike against Gilead; Serena Joy and Commander Waterford attempt to find their way forward in their new lives.

Episodes.Name: Pigs
Episodes.Description: On the run, an injured June and the fugitive Handmaids find refuge at a farm. In Gilead, an imprisoned Lawrence tries to avoid a death sentence. Aunt Lydia reels from the loss of 86 children on Angels' Flight.

Episodes.Name: Nightshade
Episodes.Description: June plots revenge at the local Jezebels, before she and the Handmaids plan to leave the farm for the next safe house. In Toronto, Moira deals with the fallout of June's choices. Serena and Fred are bound together by a miracle.

Episodes.Name: The Crossing
Episodes.Description: Captured by Gilead, June faces a vengeful Aunt Lydia and endures a torturous interrogation. Nick and Lawrence collaborate to protect June. In Toronto, Luke struggles with how to help June and Hannah.

Episodes.Name: Milk
Episodes.Description: June takes a harrowing journey with Janine, trying to escape Gilead, as Janine remembers a stressful experience in her past. In Toronto, Serena tries to manipulate Rita, who seeks advice from Moira.

Episodes.Name: Chicago
Episodes.Description: June seeks out more active rebels in the Chicago war zone, while Janine tries to help her fit in with their new group of survivors. Moira goes on her first field aid mission.

Episodes.Name: Vows
Episodes.Description: After a shocking reunion with a dear friend, June contemplates the possibility of freedom, and confronts the unfulfilled promises she's made to herself and to Luke.

Episodes.Name: Home
Episodes.Description: June struggles with her newfound freedom, reuniting with loved ones and confronting her nemesis, Serena.

Episodes.Name: Testimony
Episodes.Description: June confronts Fred and Serena in court and challenges Emily to face a painful reminder of her Gilead past. Lawrence presents Aunt Lydia with a newly captured, familiar Handmaid.

Episodes.Name: Progress
Episodes.Description: June and Luke work together to save Hannah. Serena and Fred greet unexpected visitors from Gilead. Janine tries to assist Aunt Lydia when a Handmaid-in-training goes on hunger strike.

Episodes.Name: The Wilderness
Episodes.Description: June draws on all her resources and relationships, risking everything to ensure her own kind of justice.

Episodes.Name: Morning
Episodes.Description: June confronts the consequences of killing Fred. A scared Serena makes an unexpected decision.

Episodes.Name: Ballet
Episodes.Description: June struggles to move on with her life in Toronto. Serena plans an elaborate memorial. Aunt Lydia and Janine prepare Esther for her first posting as a Handmaid.

Episodes.Name: Border
Episodes.Description: June and Moira join a rebel outpost. As a pregnant widow, Serena tries to restore her status. Aunt Lydia questions her strict methods of dealing with Handmaids.

Episodes.Name: Dear Offred
Episodes.Description: June fights her need for violent revenge as Serena settles into her new role in Toronto. Rattled by Janine, Aunt Lydia makes a surprising suggestion to Lawrence.

Episodes.Name: Fairytale
Episodes.Description: June and Luke embark on a dangerous quest. Serena gets to know her new hosts.

Episodes.Name: Together
Episodes.Description: June and Luke's mission puts them in serious jeopardy. Serena senses a threat from her benefactors. Lawrence and Nick make a shocking power move.

Episodes.Name: No Man's Land
Episodes.Description: June and Serena find themselves in a desperate situation.

Episodes.Name: Motherland
Episodes.Description: June receives a tempting offer from a surprise visitor. Serena hits rock bottom and searches for allies.

Episodes.Name: Allegiance
Episodes.Description: June and Luke prepare for a rescue mission. Serena tries new tactics with her oppressive hosts. Lawrence makes a surprising proposal to elevate his status.

Episodes.Name: Safe
Episodes.Description: Under threat, June must find a way to keep herself and her family safe from Gilead and its violent supporters in Toronto.

Name: The Handmaid's Tale
Summary: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

Trailers.Description: Découvrez la série événement qui passionne l'Amérique ! ☆ Les Films à VOIR ? Ils sont ICI ...

Episodes.Name: Episode I
Episodes.Description: A small scientific team remains isolated during the Winter at an Antarctic Research Station to continue their research in the fight against climate change. When spring comes, the entire team are either dead or missing

Episodes.Name: Episode II
Episodes.Description: Johan continues to drill Maggie for information on Annika's whereabouts. The summer team tries to find clues of what could have happened during the winter, unveiling a first possible suspect: Ramon, the winter cook.

Episodes.Name: Episode III
Episodes.Description: Tension mounts with two survivors telling conflicting stories. Who is to be believed? Meanwhile, the reconstruction of events continues, with one of the members of Polaris attempting to signal for help from a neighboring station.

Episodes.Name: Episode IV
Episodes.Description: Arthur reveals that the body they found buried in the snow doesn't belong to any of the Polaris VI. It appears to be from a failed mission that ended in tragedy.

Episodes.Name: Episode V
Episodes.Description: The survivors head to the burnt out station of Polaris V hoping to salvage communications equipment. But the mystery deepens. Did the death of a Polaris V scientist lead to the events of today?

Episodes.Name: Episode VI
Episodes.Description: Johan realises they've been searching in the wrong direction all along. He urgently redirects the search for his missing wife, which can resume after the storm has finally passed.

Episodes.Name: Episode X
Episodes.Description: After breaking out of his confinement, Charlie cuts the ship's power once again and embarks on a murderous rampage. As Olivia finds herself one step closer to Rachel, Gloria pulls away from Wilde.

Episodes.Name: Episode XI

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.1
Episodes.Description: George, who begins to re-live time after witnessing the world end. He is recruited into an organization that harnesses this power to prevent global catastrophes, but goes rogue in a bid to save the woman he loves.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.2
Episodes.Description: After a freak accident harms someone close to George, he is left distraught. He can't stop himself from asking the question - if he is working with an organisation that can turn back time, why can't they undo what has happened?

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.3
Episodes.Description: Following a personal loss, George decides to stop mourning and take action instead. And if his colleagues at the Lazarus Project won't help him, George will need to find support elsewhere - even if that means appealing to Lazarus' sworn enemies.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.4
Episodes.Description: A personal tragedy has set George on a collision course with the Lazarus Project. George is determined to reset time to get back the person he loves - but the only way to do so is by causing a global catastrophe.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.5
Episodes.Description: George continues on his mission to create chaos and turn back time. Trying desperately to keep the Lazarus Project off the scent, George tries to shift the suspicion from himself by making a longtime Lazarus employee the scapegoat.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.6
Episodes.Description: Closer than ever to his goal, George rushes to finish the job before Lazarus can discover what he's up to. Out on a limb, the only people that George can ally himself with are a group of mercenaries.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.7
Episodes.Description: George wakes up with everything he wished for - but all is not as it seems. George grapples with his guilt and begins to confront some unpleasant truths - including how his actions may have fundamentally changed him as a person.

Episodes.Name: Episode #1.8
Episodes.Description: When the Lazarus Project are rocked by an event that they have no control over, the organisation is sent into disarray. They are in a race against time to find a solution to what seems like an impossible problem.

Episodes.Name: We Just Decided To
Episodes.Description: Will's professional idealism is put to the test with his new news team when they are first to cover the Deep Horizon platform oil spill.

Episodes.Name: News Night 2.0
Episodes.Description: The news team makes its first stumble when its spotlight on Arizona's new immigration law turns into a pundit free-for-all debacle.

Episodes.Name: The 112th Congress
Episodes.Description: As the news team covers the Tea Party candidates during the US Congressional mid-term elections, the network 's senior executives confront Charlie about Will's newly confrontational tone.

Episodes.Name: I'll Try to Fix You
Episodes.Description: Will's new idealism leads him to be playing into the hands of the tabloid press determined to discredit him.

Episodes.Name: Amen
Episodes.Description: On the week of 2011's Valentine's Day, the news team is forced to hire a local Egyptian stringer to report on Arab Spring developments and find they have placed him in great danger.

Episodes.Name: Bullies
Episodes.Description: As Will deals with insomnia and online death threats, Sloan's frustrating interview with a Japanese nuclear rep about the Fukushima disaster gets her in major trouble.
When Charlie gets a tip from a mysterious informant that the President is about to make a major announcement, the news team tries to confirm what it is about.

Episodes.Name: The Blackout, Part 1: Tragedy Porn
Episodes.Description: To salvage their ratings, the news team decides to lead with lurid criminal trial coverage at the expense of more worthy stories like the debt ceiling debate.

Episodes.Name: The Blackout, Part 2: Mock Debate
Episodes.Description: To get the last rating jump to get the Republican Party Debate, the news team get an exclusive interview with a former friend of Casey Anthony.

Episodes.Name: The Greater Fool
Episodes.Description: Will is in the hospital and is too discouraged to return to work as his colleagues get the final clue needed to thwart the execs wanting to fire him.

Episodes.Name: First Thing We Do, Let's Kill All the Lawyers
Episodes.Description: A lawyer interviews Will McAvoy about an institutional failure at ACN related to a news story that has been proved inaccurate.

Episodes.Name: The Genoa Tip
Episodes.Description: After running with what the team believes is an accurate tip backfires, delivering a heavy blow to their credibility.

Episodes.Name: Willie Pete
Episodes.Description: Will discovers that someone has leaked information to Nina Howard, the Genoa team uncovers more leads in the story, and Maggie prepares for the Uganda trip. Meanwhile, Jim takes a stand against Romney's press team.

Episodes.Name: Unintended Consequences
Episodes.Description: October 3, 2011: When Will's interview with Shelly of OWS goes horribly wrong, the Genoa team are at risk of losing a potentially valuable lead. Recounting her trip in Uganda to Rebecca Halliday, Maggie relives the experience. Jim's frustrations with the Romney campaign continue.

Episodes.Name: News Night with Will McAvoy
Episodes.Description: March 16, 2012: As fighting erupts in Syria and investigations into the killing of Trayvon Martin begin, Will receives a surprise phone call from his father. Meanwhile, pictures of Sloan posing naked appear on the web and Jim believes Maggie's performance at work is being affected by her time in Uganda.

Episodes.Name: One Step Too Many
Episodes.Description: Will makes an appearance on an ACN morning show. Jim meets old friends and foes when Hallie comes to visit. The ACN staff interview a general with knowledge of Operation Genoa, but Jerry's handling of the interview may prove costly.

Episodes.Name: Red Team III
Episodes.Description: In the aftermath of ACN's Operation Genoa report, the staff who put it together face some serious blowback, not just when the government responds but also when the sources' credibility comes into question.

Episodes.Name: Election Night: Part I
Episodes.Description: On the night of the 2012 presidential election, Maggie and Don chase a story, Sloan and Mac ask Neal for a favor, Don learns that Jerry has a lawsuit in store for him too, and Will and Mac's personal differences return.

Episodes.Name: Election Night: Part II
Episodes.Description: As coverage of Election Night 2012 continues, the staff has to decide on which breaking story to pursue. Leona decides to let Reese decide. Mac and Will's situation heads closer to the edge. And Sloan finds her anonymous bidder.

Episodes.Name: Boston
Episodes.Description: In the wake of the Genoa debacle, the team decides to use caution in reporting a major breaking story. Neal is contacted by an anonymous source in possession of stolen government documents; Sloan looks to solve a takeover puzzle.

Episodes.Name: Run
Episodes.Description: While Rebecca must once again defend ACN during a possible lawsuit, Will tries to protect Neal from the aftermath of the DOD leak; Charlie and Leona deal with a hostile takeover; Sloan worries about Don's involvement with insider information.

Episodes.Name: Main Justice
Episodes.Description: When the team attends the White House Correspondents' Dinner in Washington, Mac makes an unexpected acquaintance and Will gets a surprise.

Episodes.Name: Contempt
Episodes.Description: Will continues to defy the government by refusing to out the name of the source of the stolen documents. The team tries to make sure that the first reporter that wrote the story gets out of the middle east safely, and ACN's new buyer's style of news doesn't sit well with Charlie. Sloane and Don keep dodging Human Resources, and Mac sets up a secret meeting of her own. Sloane and Charlie try to find another buyer for ACN. Jim tries to be supportive of his girlfriend's online column.

Episodes.Name: Oh Shenandoah
Episodes.Description: Shocking information regarding the source comes to light in the fight for Will's freedom.

Episodes.Name: What Kind of Day Has It Been
Episodes.Description: The team looks forward as they mourn the loss of a coworker.

Episodes.Description: After training with Benny in New York, Beth heads to Paris for her rematch with Borgov. But a wild night sends her into a self-destructive spiral.

Episodes.Name: End Game
Episodes.Description: A visit from an old friend forces Beth to reckon with her past and rethink her priorities, just in time for the biggest match of her life.

Name: The Queen's Gambit
Summary: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA. But child stardom comes at a price.

Trailers.Title: The Queen's Gambit Limited Series Trailer | Rotten Tomatoes TV
Trailers.Description: Check out the new The Queen's Gambit Limited Series Trailer starring Anya Taylor-Joy! Let us know what you think in the ...

Episodes.Name: I.N.A.S.I.A.L.
Episodes.Description: Thrown into the deep end during his first week at the CIA, rookie lawyer Owen Hendricks quickly gets in over his head when uncovers a possible threat.

Episodes.Name: N.L.T.S.Y.P.
Episodes.Description: While scrambling to learn how to navigate the high-stakes world of international espionage, Owen attempts to track down classified information on Max.

Episodes.Name: Y.D.E.K.W.Y.D.
Episodes.Description: Owen's crash course in CIA protocols continues as he negotiates with Max, goes on a date with a co-worker and contends with a hostile agency employee.

Episodes.Name: I.Y.D.I.A.A.C.
Episodes.Description: When a major snag jeopardizes Max's, case, Owen races to find a legal loophole-- and urges her not to take matters into her own ruthless hands.

Episodes.Name: T.S.L.A.Y.P.
Episodes.Description: Owen's plan to move on from Max suffers a setback when he's ordered back to Phoenix, where credit cards and prying eyes causes problems at work and home.

Episodes.Name: I.C.I.N.C.
Episodes.Description: On the heels of his risky negotiations on Max's behalf, Owen face's uncomfortable questions from his colleagues -- and friends -- about their connection.

Episodes.Name: I.M.F.T.B.S.
Episodes.Description: A mission to Geneva to retrieve assets spirals into chaos for Owen and Max. Hannah's mom pressures her for information.

Episodes.Name: W.T.F.I.O.H.
Episodes.Description: The mission with Max takes a dangerous turn as complications arise, bullets fly -- and Owen's personal and professional lives collide.

Name: The Recruit
Summary: Follows a lawyer at the CIA who gets entangled in dangerous international power politics when a former asset threatens to expose the nature of her long-term relationship with the agency.

Trailers.Title: The Recruit | Official Trailer | Netflix
Trailers.Description: Watch the official trailer for The Recruit, an upcoming Netflix series starring Noah Centineo. A fledgling lawyer at the CIA becomes ...

Trailers.Title: THE RECRUIT Trailer (2022) Noah Centineo, Drama Series
Trailers.Description: THE RECRUIT Trailer (2022) Noah Centineo, Drama Series © 2022 - Netflix.

Trailers.Title: THE RECRUIT Official Trailer | Netflix
Trailers.Description: THE RECRUIT Official Trailer | Netflix Streaming December 16 on Netflix The Recruit centers around Owen Hendricks (Noah ...

Episodes.Name: Sleep of the Just
Episodes.Description: While searching for an escaped nightmare in the waking world, Morpheus falls prey to Roderick Burgess, an occultist looking to summon and imprison Death.

Episodes.Name: Imperfect Hosts
Episodes.Description: Morpheus begins his quest to find his tools of power - his sand, ruby and helm - by paying a visit to a pair of notoriously dysfunctional brothers.

Episodes.Name: Dream a Little Dream of Me
Episodes.Description: Morpheus tracks down the last-known person in possession of his sand - and receives an unexpected lesson on humanity. Ethel pays a visit to her son.

Episodes.Name: A Hope in Hell
Episodes.Description: A lead on the whereabouts of his helm compels Morpheus to seek an audience with Lucifer. A confused John receives a helping hand from a good Samaritan.
With Morpheus caught off guard, John settles in at a diner to watch the people around him - and put his theory about truth and lies to a terrifying test.

Episodes.Name: The Sound of Her Wings
Episodes.Description: Feeling a bit rudderless, Morpheus shadows his hard-working big sister, who offers him advice and encourages him to reconnect with an old acquaintance.

Episodes.Name: The Doll's House
Episodes.Description: Lucienne comes to Morpheus with disturbing news. Rose Walker goes in search of family. Admirers of Corinthians work scheme to get his attention.

Episodes.Name: Playing House
Episodes.Description: As Morpheus closes in on one of his missing creations, Rose ramps up efforts to locate her brother - and unwittingly makes a friend's dream come true.

Episodes.Name: Collectors
Episodes.Description: Odd disturbances shake up The Dreaming, Rose sets out on a road trip with a new friend, and The Corinthian arrives with a guest at a creepy convention.

Episodes.Name: Lost Hearts
Episodes.Description: As the Dream vortex grows more powerful and the walls between the realms weaken, Rose must make a difficult choice. Morpheus confronts The Corinthian.

Episodes.Name: Dream of a Thousand Cats/Calliope
Episodes.Description: In this two-part story collection, a Siamese cat dreaming of a new world and a writer in desperate need of inspiration cross paths with Morpheus.

Name: The Sandman
Summary: Upon escaping after decades of imprisonment by a mortal wizard, Dream, the personification of dreams, sets about to reclaim his lost equipment.

Trailers.Title: The Sandman | Official Trailer | Netflix
Trailers.Description: Dream Dangerously. Enter the world of THE SANDMAN on August 5, only on Netflix. There is another world that waits for all of us ...

Trailers.Title: The Sandman - Official Trailer (2022) Tom Sturridge
Trailers.Description: Check out the trailer for The Sandman, the upcoming series based on the DC comic series written by Neil Gaiman. The Sandman ...

Trailers.Title: The Sandman | First Look | Netflix
Trailers.Description: The Lord of Dreams has been summoned, and captured, by mortal men. Once free from his captivity, this eternal ruler of Dreams ...

Episodes.Name: Pilot
Episodes.Description: While Dutch and Claudette investigate the murder of Nancy Reborg, they discover that her daughter is missing and has been sold by her addict father to a child molester. David tries to crack corruption in the Barn by recruiting Terry to help him take down Vic.

Episodes.Name: Our Gang
Episodes.Description: Following the shooting death of a police department informant, Aceveda turns up the heat in the investigation of Mackey and his Strike Team.

Episodes.Name: The Spread
Episodes.Description: It's warrant sweep day at the Barn. Vic and the Strike Team discover visiting NBA superstar Derrick Tripp hanging out with his "homies" before the evening game with the Lakers. Vic decides to do his part for the home team by keeping Tripp as a "friendly hostage". One of Vic's street informants, Connie, approaches him after having been roughed up by a new john. Vic hands off the case to Claudette and Dutch, who is convinced they're on the trail of a serial killer. Dutch's theories are proved wrong when he and Claudette ultimately discover that their perp is not a ...

Episodes.Name: Dawg Days
Episodes.Description: A dispute over an up-and-coming singer's success erupts in a gang war that threatens to bring Vic down, too; a case that could help Aceveda's political future sends Dutch and Claudette searching for a missing day laborer.

Episodes.Name: Blowback
Episodes.Description: Mackey must recover the stolen evidence from a drug bust before Aceveda is able to pin the theft on him.

Episodes.Name: Cherrypoppers
Episodes.Description: As Dutch's theory about a serial killer preying on prostitutes proves true, he convinces Aceveda to launch an all out effort to find him before he strikes again; Julien decides to bring down Vic for stealing drugs.

Episodes.Name: Pay in Pain
Episodes.Description: The murder of seven gang members has Vic be teamed with a Latino detective assigned to crack the case.

Episodes.Name: Cupid & Psycho
Episodes.Description: As the Strike Team is reassigned pending the investigation in the theft of evidence, Vic teams with Claudette in order to keep some deadly drugs off the street.

Episodes.Name: Throwaway
Episodes.Description: Lemonhead sets out to make things right following his shooting of an unarmed man.

Episodes.Name: Dragonchasers
Episodes.Description: As Dutch uncovers a lead to the serial killer, a reporter questions force Aceveda to explain problems he thought were buried far in the past.

Episodes.Name: Carnivores
Episodes.Description: A confrontation between a local drug dealer and Black Muslims places Vic in danger of being exposed.

Episodes.Name: Two Days of Blood
Episodes.Description: As a deployment policy leads to a double homicide that places Aceveda in the hot seat with potential voters, Vic is forced to help Gilroy avoid being implicated in a hit and run.

Episodes.Name: Circles
Episodes.Description: As cop killings strike Farmington, Aceveda is caught between two corrupt cops looking to save their own skins.

Episodes.Name: The Quick Fix
Episodes.Description: As Captain Aceveda tries to fend off a city council investigation, Vic looks to stop a pair of brutal drug lords from moving into Farmington.

Episodes.Name: Dead Soldiers
Episodes.Description: An arson attack on a local drug dealer threatens to expose Vic's protection racket.

Episodes.Name: Partners
Episodes.Description: An amputated arm sends Dutch in search of a sadomasochistic killer; Vic sets out to help his old mentor on the force get revenge against the thug whose complaint forced him into retirement.

Episodes.Name: Carte Blanche
Episodes.Description: A murder investigation leads Vic to a massive money-laundering scheme.

Episodes.Name: Greenlit
Episodes.Description: Elementary school drug dealing prompts Vic to redouble his efforts to bring down a ruthless new supplier.

Episodes.Name: Homewrecker
Episodes.Description: The Barn mobilizes to investigate a murderous rampage at a battered women's shelter.

Episodes.Name: Barnstormers
Episodes.Description: As a new murder investigation exposes Dutch's crisis of confidence, Vic sets out to stop the abuse of a neighbor by her violent boyfriend.

Episodes.Name: Scar Tissue
Episodes.Description: Vic and the Strike team set their sights on taking Armadillo off the streets for good.

Episodes.Name: Co-Pilot
Episodes.Description: In a look back at the Barn's early days, Vic struggles to secure his hold on the Strike Team command, while Dutch is faced with choosing between a veteran detective and Claudette.

Episodes.Name: Coyotes
Episodes.Description: The leak of the auditor's report jeopardizes the futures of everyone at the Farm.

Episodes.Name: Inferno
Episodes.Description: Vic mobilizes the Strike Team to help Aceveda's election campaign; Dutch and Claudette suspect a teenaged girl is lying about the rape accusation she's made against her employer.

Episodes.Name: Breakpoint
Episodes.Description: As his own life starts crumbling around him, Vic pitches in to help Dutch in the search for a deadly pedophile.

Episodes.Name: Dominoes Falling
Episodes.Description: As he struggles to keep his job, Vic pushes ahead with a new plan to hijack a mob money shipment.

Episodes.Name: Playing Tight
Episodes.Description: Vic sets out to stop stolen military weapons from fueling a gang war, unaware that it threatens to expose him as the mastermind behind the theft of the Armenian mob's laundered money.

Episodes.Name: Blood and Water
Episodes.Description: Vic promises a gang lieutenant the top job if he agrees to set up his boss; Dutch and Claudette's investigation into a gang shooting points to an unexpected triggerman.

Episodes.Name: Bottom Bitch
Episodes.Description: A hooker wants to Vic to punish her former pimp, Dutch arrests a sex offender in an elderly woman's rape.

Episodes.Name: Streaks and Tips
Episodes.Description: The rivalry between the Strike Team and the Decoy Squad heats up as they compete to find a murder suspect.

Episodes.Name: Mum
Episodes.Description: As Dutch and Claudette continue to pursue a rapist who is targeting elderly women, the arrest of a local gang member threatens to expose the Strike Team's involvement in the money train heist.

Episodes.Name: Posse Up
Episodes.Description: Officer Tommy Hisk becomes a prime suspect in the murder of his ex-wife and son.

Episodes.Name: Safe
Episodes.Description: As missing persons investigation uncovers a graveyard for illegal immigrants working in an illicit drug lab.

Episodes.Name: Cracking Ice
Episodes.Description: Vic is enlisted to help save his rivals on the Decoy team from having their undercover operation exposed.

Episodes.Name: Slipknot
Episodes.Description: A lynching threatens to ignite a race war between Farmington's black and Latino gangs.

Episodes.Name: What Power Is...
Episodes.Description: Captain Aceveda turns up the heat in his search for the gangster who sexually assaulted him.

Episodes.Name: Strays
Episodes.Description: As Dutch tries to understand "The Cuddler" rapist, Vic enlists Danny for an important undercover assignment.

Episodes.Name: Riceburner
Episodes.Description: The pursuit of a gang hitman pits the tight-lipped Korean community against the police.

Episodes.Name: Fire in the Hole
Episodes.Description: As Vic tries to sidetrack the money train investigation, Claudette goes undercover to crack a child porn ring.

Episodes.Name: All In
Episodes.Description: As the Strike Team is threatened with exposure in the money train heist, Claudette goes it alone in order to find evidence of a public defender's drug addiction.

Episodes.Name: On Tilt
Episodes.Description: As Vic goes after Margos, Claudette risks her career to see that an innocent man is freed from prison.

Episodes.Name: The Cure
Episodes.Description: The Shield (2002) enters its fourth season with Vic Mackey adrift after his past actions have caught up with him. He's no longer the cop he used to be - the Strike Team has dissolved and he's stuck babysitting a menial surveillance sting that keeps him off the street. With Captain Aceveda moving on to his new City Council position, Captain Monica Rawling prepares to take over the Barn and implement her controversial anti-gang policies.

Episodes.Name: Grave
Episodes.Description: Vic agrees to quietly bring in a teenaged drug user before learning of his role in a deadly armed robbery.

Episodes.Name: Bang
Episodes.Description: When her official arrival at the Barn is greeted by the outbreak of a deadly gang war, Monica assigns Vic the task of ending it.

Episodes.Name: Doghouse
Episodes.Description: As Vic pursues an escaped rapist, A.D.A Insardi sends Dutch and Claudette after a low level drug dealer.

Episodes.Name: Tar Baby
Episodes.Description: As Monica is forced to defend her crime-fighting tactics, Vic's pursuit of a killer creates problems for Antwon, while Dutch's secret deal with the D.A.'s office gets him and Claudette assigned to a murder investigation.

Episodes.Name: Insurgents
Episodes.Description: A raid on a church being used as a drug drop places Monica in hot water with the community and her own cops.

Episodes.Name: Hurt
Episodes.Description: As Aceveda uses a cleverly-edited videotape to force her to sideline Vic, Monica goes toe-to-toe with a social worker whose negligence led to the hospitalization of a seven-year-old foster child.

Episodes.Name: Cut Throat
Episodes.Description: With Shane under orders to deliver Vic's body to Antwon, Monica looks for the leak that has led to the murder of some neighborhood informants.

Episodes.Name: String Theory
Episodes.Description: As Shane enlists Vic and his men in the search for the body of a teenaged informant, the disappearance of two cops on patrol begins to look like payback for Monica's tough new policies.

Episodes.Name: Back in the Hole
Episodes.Description: As Vic decides to tell Monica the truth about Shane, Dutch and Claudette suspect an alleged serial killer of murder.

Episodes.Name: A Thousand Deaths
Episodes.Description: Vic pits Antwon's henchmen against each other in an effort to find the cop killers; Dutch and Claudette suspect Detective Billings of failing to stop a deadly carjacking.

Episodes.Name: Judas Priest
Episodes.Description: Vic and Monica work to link Antwon to the cop killings, only to have Aceveda sell them out in an effort to keep the truth about his sexual assault from being made public.

Episodes.Name: Ain't That a Shame
Episodes.Description: Monica asks Vic to find a way to hold Antwon Mitchell responsible for the murder of two Farmington cops.

Episodes.Name: Extraction
Episodes.Description: As the Strike Team tries to end a race war between Blacks and Mexicans, Dutch and Claudette investigate a riot at a high school that also stem from racial tensions.

Episodes.Name: Enemy of Good
Episodes.Description: Lem's loyalty to Vic is tested when he's interrogated by Lt. Kavanaugh and Aceveda about the Strike Team's corrupt past.

Episodes.Name: Jailbait
Episodes.Description: While the Strike Team figures out their next step concerning IAD's investigation into Lem, they put Tina undercover to help bust a sex trafficking operation.

Episodes.Name: Tapa Boca
Episodes.Description: As Becca contemplates whether or not to represent the Strike Team, Vic discovers the truth about Emolia.

Episodes.Name: Trophy
Episodes.Description: Kavanaugh bugs the Strike Team's clubhouse to get his stalled investigation back on track as Vic and the guys try to end a deadly prescription drug ring.

Episodes.Name: Rap Payback
Episodes.Description: The walls close in on Vic when Kavanaugh invades the Barn and sets up office.

Episodes.Name: Man Inside
Episodes.Description: The Strike Team's solidarity begins to crack under Kavanaugh's constant scrutiny.

Episodes.Name: Kavanaugh
Episodes.Description: As Kavanaugh deals with the emotional circumstances surrounding the return of his ex-wife, his obsession to take down the Strike Team comes to a head.

Episodes.Name: Smoked
Episodes.Description: With their finances frozen, Vic and his guys are forced to find other means to bail Lem out of jail.

Episodes.Name: Of Mice and Lem
Episodes.Description: While Lem prepares to plead guilty to the heroin charges, Vic strikes a deal with Antwon Mitchell that will guarantee Lem's safety in prison.

Episodes.Name: Postpartum
Episodes.Description: Vic arranges to get Lem safely out of the country and set up a new life for him in Mexico.

Episodes.Name: Wins and Losses
Episodes.Description: This 15-minute season six prequel shows the immediate aftermath of season 5. It is the day of Lem's memorial service, and an emotional time for Vic, Shane and Ronnie.

Episodes.Name: On the Jones
Episodes.Description: Shane's guilt for killing Lem intensifies after the Strike Team learns that he didn't make a deal with the authorities, and Kavanaugh resorts to threatening informants and planting evidence to pin Lem's murder on Vic.

Episodes.Name: Baptism by Fire
Episodes.Description: Detectives discover the evidence Kavanaugh planted to make Vic look guilty for Lem's death, but Dutch begins to suspect that everything is too convenient. Meanwhile, Vic tries to find the Salvadoran leader Guardo, who escaped to Mexico.

Episodes.Name: Back to One
Episodes.Description: Vic captures Guardo and tries to coerce a confession to Lem's murder out of him. However, Shane, the real killer, begs Vic for leniency on Guardo's behalf. Meanwhile, Dutch and Gardocki bring down a gang of meth dealers.

Episodes.Name: The New Guy
Episodes.Description: Claudette begins making radical changes to the Strike Team in anticipation of Vic's imminent forced retirement. Meanwhile, Vic's helplessness for not saving Lem boils over after he fails to play peacemaker in a gang war.

Episodes.Name: Haunts
Episodes.Description: Shane is hospitalized after a beating, and his wife leaves him for having an affair. An unlikely suspect emerges in the serial rapist case, and an undercover agent in the Salvadoran gang tells Vic that Guardo didn't kill Lem.

Episodes.Name: Chasing Ghosts
Episodes.Description: After Vic learns that Guardo wasn't Lem's killer, he begins to suspect that Shane could have been responsible. Meanwhile, Vic does a favor for a city official, hoping it will give him an ally in his quest to avoid early retirement.

Episodes.Name: Exiled
