Episodes.Name: No Place Like Home
Episodes.Description: Bea Smith enters prison after being charged with the attempted murder of her husband. Bea is separated from her daughter and sent to Wentworth on remand. She is then forced to learn how the prison works.

Episodes.Name: Fly Me Away
Episodes.Description: In the aftermath of the riot, Will blackmails Doreen into helping him and Bea is given no choice but to continue to lie.

Episodes.Name: The Girl Who Waited
Episodes.Description: Bea gets caught in between rivals Jacs and Franky. While Erica gets the staff offside with forced changes to the 'Wet Cells'.

Episodes.Name: The Things We Do
Episodes.Description: Franky teaches Bea a tough lesson; Liz struggles with old demons; Franky stirs up new feelings in Erica.

Episodes.Name: The Velvet Curtain
Episodes.Description: Erica can't escape her feelings for Franky and Bea reveals to Liz the truth about her marriage.

Episodes.Name: Captive
Episodes.Description: Bea feels threatened when Harry says he may not be able to deal with their daughter any longer. Vera's mother reveals a long standing lie to the staff.

Episodes.Name: Something Dies
Episodes.Description: Bea pays a high price for crossing Jacs, whilst Franky gets her revenge and Will reverts to his old ways.

Episodes.Name: Mind Games
Episodes.Description: To gain back control of Wentworth, Jacs makes a final play to break Bea.

Episodes.Name: To the Moon
Episodes.Description: Bea is buoyed by the inmate's support, while Jacs's power further diminishes and Vera and Fletch's date comes to a humiliating end.

Episodes.Name: Checkmate
Episodes.Description: The truth behind the riot is finally revealed and Bea confronts a killer leading to deadly consequences.

Episodes.Name: Born Again
Episodes.Description: Three months after Jacs death, new arrival Joan Ferguson makes an enemy of Franky, while Bea discovers a new purpose.

Episodes.Name: Whatever It Takes
Episodes.Description: Bea attempts to get revenge on Brayden by goading Harry into an act of violence, whilst Franky's determination to maintain power pushes her to extreme lengths.

Episodes.Name: Boys in the Yard
Episodes.Description: Following the failure of Harry to avenge their daughter's death, Bea hatches a daring plot to lure Brayden Holt to the jail.

Episodes.Name: The Danger Within
Episodes.Description: Bea faces down an assassination attempt from the Holt clan. While new inmates enter the compound.

Episodes.Name: Twist the Knife
Episodes.Description: Bea discovers Simmo has a weakness she can exploit for her own ends. Meanwhile Fletch and Will face off in a confrontation that will end their friendship for good.

Episodes.Name: The Pink Dragon
Episodes.Description: Simmo's attempt to kill Bea ends in tragedy, while Liz faces her greatest dilemma: to snitch or not to snitch.

Episodes.Name: Metamorphosis
Episodes.Description: When Ferguson psychologically manipulates Vera she crosses a point of no return whilst Maxine orchestrates a desperate bid to see her spurned lover.

Episodes.Name: Sins of the Mother
Episodes.Description: An isolated and paranoid Franky tries to uncover which inmate is leaking vital information to Ferguson.

Episodes.Name: The Fixer
Episodes.Description: When Ferguson discovers Doreen is the pregnant prisoner, the Governor threatens to have Nash's parole revoked unless she lies about the father. Will is publicly accused of an inappropriate relationship with Bea.

Episodes.Name: Jail Birds
Episodes.Description: Liz struggles to adjust to life on the outside and tries to reconnect with her estranged children. Meanwhile, Derek Channing tries to build his case against Ferguson.

Episodes.Name: Into the Night
Episodes.Description: As Bea and Franky go to war for control of the prison, Bea puts her daring plan in motion. Meanwhile, Fletch is on a downward spiral of self-destructive behaviour as his final day at Wentworth looms.

Episodes.Name: Fear Her
Episodes.Description: The extent of Bea's plan is revealed as she makes the final moves to avenge Debbie's death. Meanwhile Franky realises she is losing the support of the women and is forced to consider a deal.

Episodes.Name: The Governor's Pleasure
Episodes.Description: Bea returns to Wentworth with a heavy charge over the murder of Braydon Holt, while Ferguson makes it clear that she owns Bea. Battle begins over the control of the prison.

Episodes.Name: Failing Upwards
Episodes.Description: Liz makes a tough decision about her and her family. Franky loses someone close to her, while Bea asserts her dominance as top dog. While Fletch continues his rehab after being struck by a van.

Episodes.Name: Knives Out
Episodes.Description: Franky's in trouble with her supply cut and her power base decimated, she's on her own when prisoners come after her to claim what they're owed.

Episodes.Name: Righteous Acts
Episodes.Description: Liz's world is rocked with the arrival of a new prisoner. Franky commences her sessions with Bridget, and admits to a desire for revenge against Bea.

Episodes.Name: Mercy
Episodes.Description: As Fletch readjusts to work life, Bea must forgo closely held morals as she engages in a secret plan to bring down Ferguson. Bea agrees to a visit with Kaz Proctor to demand she and her group stop committing violence in her name.

Episodes.Name: Evidence
Episodes.Description: Ferguson is blindsided by Jodie's complaint to the ombudsman. Channing attempts damage control, but Jodie's accusations of brutality promise to be very damaging for the Governor.

Episodes.Name: The Long Game
Episodes.Description: Bea is held in the psych unit and struggles to accept she had a psychotic episode. Franky is pushed to reveal her biggest secret.

Episodes.Name: Goldfish
Episodes.Description: When Bea encourages Doreen to uncover the truth behind Ferguson's obsession with "Jianna", Ferguson's renewed interest in Doreen brings on labour.

Episodes.Name: Freak Show
Episodes.Description: Bea's war with Ferguson comes to a head after Doreen returns from the hospital and tensions between Bea and those closest to her reach boiling point, as Vera finally learns the truth behind Jodie's injury after Bridget is forced to resign.

Episodes.Name: A Higher Court
Episodes.Description: Franky's parole hearing is brought forward but will she be granted a released? Meanwhile, Doreen faces an agonising choice.

Episodes.Name: The Living and the Dead
Episodes.Description: When Bea uses her alliance with Fletch to drive a wedge between Vera and Ferguson, her actions set in motion an unstoppable chain of events.

Episodes.Name: Blood and Fire
Episodes.Description: The walls are closing in on Ferguson - who will survive the final showdown?

Episodes.Name: First Blood
Episodes.Description: Joan Ferguson steps back into Wentworth prison, but this time as a prisoner. Kaz Proctor, a woman Bea used as an informant in the previous season, and her crew (The Red Right Hand) have also been imprisoned.

Episodes.Name: Poking Spiders
Episodes.Description: Ferguson launches a campaign to be released into the general prison population regardless of her peril and Kaz organises for the inmates to protest for conjugal visits.

Episodes.Name: Prisoner
Episodes.Description: Against Vera's wishes, Ferguson is released into general population. The women are out for blood but Vera confines Ferguson to her cell for safety reasons. As always, Ferguson has an end game but will she live to accomplish it?

Episodes.Name: Screw Lover
Episodes.Description: Ferguson strengthens her alliance with Kaz by painting Will as an abuser and Bea as a 'screw-lover', while Maxine receives a devastating diagnosis.

Episodes.Name: Love and Hate
Episodes.Description: With Bea in the slot, Ferguson seeks to strengthen her hold over Kaz by manipulating acting top dog, Maxine into an act of extreme violence. Bea and Allie bond while in neighbouring slots.

Episodes.Name: Divide and Conquer
Episodes.Description: When a young Koori inmate Tasha is subjected to 'prison justice' for pushing the panic button, Doreen shocks everyone by turning her back on Bea.

Episodes.Name: Panic Button
Episodes.Description: Bea holds a vote among the inmates to determine if there should be a top dog in the prison. Ferguson finds out that there is a surprise witness for Jesper.

Episodes.Name: Plan Bea
Episodes.Description: A clandestine affair heats up, but neither party knows their every move is being watched. Maxine undergoes a procedure away from the prison.

Episodes.Name: Afterlife
Episodes.Description: Bea has trouble recovering after her attack. Ferguson returns from hospital and is immediately placed under supervision in a medical hold.

Episodes.Name: Smitten
Episodes.Description: Bea discovers Allie has fallen back into drug addiction. Franky pursues Shayne in the hope of exposing Ferguson's plan to undermine her trial and secure her release from Wentworth.

Episodes.Name: Eleventh Hour
Episodes.Description: When Bea commits the ultimate sin of lagging to protect Allie, Kaz seizes on it force Bea to step down as Top Dog. Ferguson strikes again.

Episodes.Name: Seeing Red
Episodes.Description: Bea scrambles to get a step ahead of Ferguson, who's scheming as the trial approaches. Maxine continues chemotherapy. Liz believes Sonia is innocent.

Episodes.Name: Scars
Episodes.Description: The women and staff of Wentworth are reeling in the aftermath of Bea Smith's murder in a new era for the prison. While Vera has to set up a member of staff to take the heat away from herself.

Episodes.Name: The Bitch Is Back
Episodes.Description: Franky's trapped by her past, Vera takes desperate measures to foil Ferguson's self defence plea, Liz starts to regret her decision to testify against Sonia.

Episodes.Name: Nothing But the Truth
Episodes.Description: Liz goes to Court to give her statement against Sonia and her defence is torn to shreds by Sonia's defence team and Franky continues her mission to find Mike's killer.

Episodes.Name: Loose Ends
Episodes.Description: While Liz languishes back in Wentworth waiting for Don to come to her rescue, Sonia is a free woman, and Franky plans her escape.

Episodes.Name: Belly of the Beast
Episodes.Description: Franky's escape plan could have fatal consequences and Liz is forced to take drastic measures to protect herself.

Episodes.Name: Happy Birthday, Vera
Episodes.Description: The women become frustrated with the Top Dog's lack of action against Lucy, and Vera receives a birthday present she will never forget.

Episodes.Name: The Pact
Episodes.Description: Will tries to set up a trap to end the drug supply in the prison with help from Kaz and Allie. While Doreen receives a happy ending when she gets her parole.

Episodes.Name: Think Inside the Box
Episodes.Description: Franky's escape plan derails her relationship with Bridget, Sonia unleashes on Liz, and Will makes a shocking discovery.

Episodes.Name: Snakehead
Episodes.Description: Will sets out to expose Jake, forcing Vera to make a choice; Franky engages help from the outside, while the net tightens around Liz.

Episodes.Name: Mere Anarchy
Episodes.Description: Franky faces danger from an unexpected source, Ferguson pulls strings to sideline Vera, and Liz goes to extreme lengths to try to get a confession from Sonia.

Episodes.Name: Coup de Grace
Episodes.Description: Ferguson delivers Vera her coup de grace, unleashing unforeseen consequences; Franky's escape plans are waylaid when Kaz persuades her to join forces to bring down the Freak.

Episodes.Name: Hell Bent
Episodes.Description: Franky and Allie put their escape plan into action, Liz takes desperate measures to protect herself, and Ferguson suspects she's living on borrowed time.

Episodes.Name: Clean Slate
Episodes.Description: Franky fights to prove her innocence, while the aftermath of the escape drives the staff into conflict.

Episodes.Name: The Boxer
Episodes.Description: Franky finds the evidence she was seeking and acts on it. Ruby is recruited into fighting against her will. Allie learns some new information. Jake makes an unexpected decision about how to move forward with Vera.

Episodes.Name: Bleed Out
Episodes.Description: After being shot Franky seeks Bridget's help but the police net is tightening and time is running out. Meanwhile, Kaz faces her toughest challenge when she warns Kosta to stop fight club, but that doesn't stop Ruby from fighting.

Episodes.Name: Winter Is Here
Episodes.Description: Marie Winter arrives; Sonia makes a deal with Vera and the workshop is reopened. Will cracks under pressure as he confesses to Jake that he buried Joan alive.

Episodes.Name: Bitter Pill
Episodes.Description: When Jake saves Liz's life in a selfless act, Vera is forced to reassess her opinion of him.

Episodes.Name: Angel of Wentworth
Episodes.Description: As Sonia tries to spin her 'Angel of Wentworth' PR into an innocence campaign, her past crimes threaten to derail her - and it could be fatal.

Episodes.Name: The Edge
Episodes.Description: When Sonia is refused entry into Protection, she goes on the attack, setting up a plan to discredit Kaz's position as Top Dog. With Marie onside, they set a scheme in motion, which may have drastic repercussions for Allie.

Episodes.Name: Lovers and Fighters
Episodes.Description: Ruby's personal information becomes knowledge and Allie convinces her to play it safe. Meanwhile Marie has a lead on who killed her son.

Episodes.Name: Shallow Grave
Episodes.Description: Will unburdens his problem to Vera, but still loses it. Boomer decides to fight in a boxing match. Rita plays a dangerous game over her cover with Marie. Jake, Will and Vera make a decision.

Episodes.Name: Fractured
Episodes.Description: Marie discovers that Liz may have witnessed the attack on Cherry Li and tries to protect her from Drago. Meanwhile, Vera, Will and Jake face a blackmail threat - someone else knows the dark secret they are protecting.

Episodes.Name: Indelible Ink
Episodes.Description: Drago discovers the truth behind Marie's son's death, as a disgraced Channing tries to manipulate Vera and Will into giving him his old job as governor back.

Episodes.Name: Showdown
Episodes.Description: The police close in on Vera, Will and Jake. While Rita takes drastic action to protect her sister.

Episodes.Name: Blood Wedding
Episodes.Description: 3 months have passed and Rita is finally released from the slot, with both Rita and Marie receiving 15 year sentences. A junkie takes Vera hostage which makes her rethink her governorship, and Rita suffers a tragic loss.

Episodes.Name: Payback
Episodes.Description: Rita and Kaz form an alliance to bring down Marie, whilst Jake's jealously toward Vera is apparent as she forms a bond with Greg. The position of Deputy Governor is reassigned to officer Linda Miles.

Episodes.Name: Atonement
Episodes.Description: Kaz begins a journey of self discovery and atonement, while Linda Miles begins her tenure as acting deputy. Former Walford officer Sean Brody is transferred to Wentworth.

Episodes.Name: Karen
Episodes.Description: Kaz makes amends with her past, as Rita has to deal with Stang's threats to expose her. While Liz is made to stay silent as Sean helps to get a dead body out of the prison as Linda realises she could lose her job over it.

Episodes.Name: Ascension
Episodes.Description: Wentworth is in shock as they mourn Kaz's death and the following investigation brings staff to a head and inmates to breaking point when they have to vote in a new Top Dog.

Episodes.Name: Mother
Episodes.Description: The Prisoners tensions are still extremely high, as Marie learns the truth about the death of her son. While Boomer has some long awaited catching up to do, with her mother.

Episodes.Name: Bad Blood
Episodes.Description: Ruby fights for her life as Marie continues to manipulate Will. Linda works doubles as she's in debt $20,000 as Vera takes Rita to see Ruby against governors orders.

Episodes.Name: Protection
Episodes.Description: Marie's fall from grace continues her protector wants her silenced for good. Linda struggles after being manipulated by Sean, and Liz meets her son for the first time in years.

Episodes.Name: Under Siege Pt 1
Episodes.Description: Liz makes a desperate attempt to see her son, whilst Jake learns of Linda's $20,000 debt. Marie makes a bold plan to be exonerated for her crimes but things take a dramatic turn that could change Wentworth forever.

Episodes.Name: Under Siege Pt 2
Episodes.Description: The lives of officers and prisoners remain in the balance as the siege comes to a violent and bloody end. Lives are changed forever Wentworth will never be the same, ever again.

Episodes.Name: Resurrection
Episodes.Description: After the siege many of the prisoners and officers struggle to rebuild their lives with the horror they endured, as the new General Manager deals with the fallout of the siege, an old Top Dog reenters the compound, the legendary Lou Kelly.

Episodes.Name: Ends and Means
Episodes.Description: With Marie being made the scapegoat for the siege she makes a desperate attempt to get into general, as Ruby fights for her innocence when an allegation is lodged against her, while Boomer continues her collision course with Lou.

Episodes.Name: Enemy of the State
Episodes.Description: With a new arrival Judy Bryant entering the prison, she shakes things up for the inmates and staff alike. While Marie confronts her demons with a session with Dr Miller.

Episodes.Name: Revenant
Episodes.Description: Allie refuses to guarantee Marie's safety after the Protection Unit gets shut down as the prison teeters on a knife edge, as news of Ferguson's survival sparks turmoil for the entire prison.

Episodes.Name: Fallout
Episodes.Description: Judy incurs the wrath of Ann through Linda after she sabotages her presentation, while Allie is nervous when she has to contend with Lou's army of supporters and Ruby goes on the hunt to find Rita.

Episodes.Name: Fugitive
Episodes.Description: Rita makes the ultimate sacrifice for Ruby, while Will clashes with Ann over day-to-day management of the prison, as Ferguson returns to Wentworth much to the dismay of inmates and staff.

Episodes.Name: Battle Lines
Episodes.Description: On the edge of breaking point Allie finally faces Ferguson in an intense confrontation that brings back memories from years past. As Judy's father rejects her, she snaps with dangerous consequences.

Episodes.Name: Goldfish, Part 2
Episodes.Description: The Prison remains on lockdown after Ann's attack, Joan continues treatment with Dr Miller, and the inmates are at breaking point resulting in a riot, as Linda suffers a flashback to the siege.

Episodes.Name: Monster
Episodes.Description: Reb and Lou are rocked by a blast from the past with cult leader Sheila coming into the compound. Ferguson awaits news of her committal hearing as Vera enlists Allie to help her with devastating consequences.

Episodes.Name: The Enemy Within
Episodes.Description: Vera makes a dangerous plan to bring down Ferguson, while Lou is on the warpath and is out for blood, as Allie realises her time as Top Dog is running out and Linda threatens to sue the department.

Episodes.Name: Rogue
Episodes.Description: Allie returns to Wentworth.Marie enlists the help of Sheila to help take out Lou with tragic unforeseen circumstances. Boomer is asked to step up as top dog, while Sheila's case is closed when Reb and Lou lie to the police.

Episodes.Name: Requiem
Episodes.Description: Marie and Lou become allies to bring down a monster with retribution coming at a deadly price. Rita and Ruby say an emotional goodbye to their father.

Episodes.Name: The Ties That Bind
Episodes.Description: A furious Ann calls a meeting about the 'systemic mismanagement' under Will Jackson's governorship. Rita returns to Wentworth a broken woman, while Marie lies for Will about their affair to a committee.

Episodes.Name: Judas Kiss
Episodes.Description: Judy crosses Ann yet again when a cruel prank backfires on her, while Eve Wilder makes an entrance with waves when she recognises Joan from her time at Blackmoore almost a decade ago.

Episodes.Name: The Unknown Terrorist
Episodes.Description: Ann is furious to learn that salacious content is being filmed in the prison and orders strip searches as a result. Judy is finally exposed as Allie's attacker and faces the wrath of the inmates. Ferguson fuels Eve's Jake obsession.

Episodes.Name: One Eye Open
Episodes.Description: With a dangerous plan that could bring down the prison Lou and Judy team up as Eve's obsession over Jake ends with Linda Miles making one of the most shocking discoveries of her career.

Episodes.Name: Collateral
Episodes.Description: The staff are put on notice after a Rita lags to Will about Lou's threat to the officers. Gavin and Boomer's camera plan finally unravels when Gavin is caught out by Linda. Rita fears Marie may tell everyone about her past.

Episodes.Name: The Abyss
Episodes.Description: Evidence comes back to haunt Joan when the passports in her plan are found by the police. While tensions with the inmates reach an all time high when Rita's past is finally exposed to all the women

Episodes.Name: The Reckoning
Episodes.Description: Joan surprises everyone when she pleads guilty in court to all her crimes. Marie's redemption comes in a horrific way. As Judy learns she was set up by the NSO, she wants the plan cancelled, but Lou has other plans.

Episodes.Name: Legacy
Episodes.Description: In Wentworth's final hours the survivors of the prison explosion try and make their way to safety as Lou's plan comes to a head. Wentworth's staff and inmates look to their futures as the prison lays in ruins before them.

Name: Wentworth
Summary: The confronting look into the lives of the inmates and prison staff of Wentworth Correctional Centre as they navigate the ups and downs of their lives in the prison system.

Episodes.Name: The Original
Episodes.Description: The park staff begin to notice strange behavior from the hosts; A mysterious Man in Black roams the park, wreaking havoc.

Episodes.Name: Chestnut
Episodes.Description: Two guests arrive at the park with different expectations; Maeve's emotions are tweaked; The Man in Black seeks help from a condemned man.

Episodes.Name: The Stray

Episodes.Name: Dissonance Theory
Episodes.Description: Dolores joins William and Logan on a bounty hunt; The Man in Black makes a significant discovery; Ford and Theresa discuss the park's future.

Episodes.Name: Contrapasso
Episodes.Description: Dolores, William and Logan reach Pariah, and are recruited for a dangerous mission; The Man in Black meets an unlikely ally.

Episodes.Name: The Adversary
Episodes.Description: Maeve charms Felix; Elsie discovers evidence that could point to sabotage; Teddy and the Man in Black conflict with a garrison.

Episodes.Name: Trompe L'Oeil
Episodes.Description: Dolores, William and Lawrence journey into treacherous terrain; Maeve presents her demand; Bernard considers his next move.

Episodes.Name: Trace Decay
Episodes.Description: Bernard struggles with a mandate; Teddy is troubled by dark memories; Maeve looks to change her script.

Episodes.Name: The Well-Tempered Clavier
Episodes.Description: Dolores and Bernard reconnect with their pasts; Maeve makes a bold proposition to Hector; Teddy finds enlightenment, at a price.

Episodes.Name: The Bicameral Mind
Episodes.Description: Ford unveils his bold new narrative; Dolores embraces her identity; Maeve sets her plan in motion.

Episodes.Name: Journey into Night
Episodes.Description: The hosts revolt against the guests while searching for a new purpose; Maeve sets out to find her daughter with some unexpected help.

Episodes.Name: Reunion
Episodes.Description: Dolores remembers she's been to the outside world; William makes a bold business venture.

Episodes.Name: Virtù e Fortuna
Episodes.Description: Dolores makes her next move; Charlotte scrambles to protect Delos' most prized asset; Bernard gets closer to the truth.

Episodes.Name: The Riddle of the Sphinx
Episodes.Description: An enigmatic figure becomes the center of Delos' secret project; The Man in Black and Lawrence follow the path to Las Mudas, but run into trouble.

Episodes.Name: Akane No Mai
Episodes.Description: Maeve and her allies have revelations in a new world; Dolores makes a decision about Teddy; Karl discovers something sinister about the hosts.

Episodes.Name: Phase Space
Episodes.Description: Maeve continues her search for her daughter; Dolores calculates her next move; Elsie gets closer to the truth about Delos.

Episodes.Name: Les Écorchés
Episodes.Description: Bernard meets with an unexpected old friend; The Cradle is under threat; Maeve encounters a scene from her past.

Episodes.Name: Kiksuya
Episodes.Description: The telling of Akecheta and the Ghost Nation's journey to consciousness; Maeve's life hangs in the balance.

Episodes.Name: Vanishing Point
Episodes.Description: The Man in Black confronts his troubled past; Charlotte forms a plan to kill all the hosts.

Episodes.Name: The Passenger
Episodes.Description: Everyone converges at the Valley Beyond.

Episodes.Name: Parce Domine
Episodes.Description: Dolores sets out to find the architect of the Rehoboam; Bernard tries to blend in; Ex-soldier Caleb tries to find his way in neo-Los Angeles.

Episodes.Name: The Winter Line
Episodes.Description: Maeve finds herself in a new park and meets a ghost from the past; Bernard makes his way back to Westworld.

Episodes.Name: The Absence of Field
Episodes.Description: Charlotte grapples with reality; Dolores and Caleb begin to form a key partnership.

Episodes.Name: The Mother of Exiles
Episodes.Description: Bernard and Ashley infiltrate a private charity event, while Dolores and Caleb make similar plans; The Man in Black prepares to re-enter society; Maeve comes face to face with an old comrade.

Episodes.Name: Genre
Episodes.Description: Serac's past is revealed; Dolores pressures Liam for access to Rehoboam; Caleb is dosed with an unusual party drug.

Episodes.Name: Decoherence
Episodes.Description: As the world falls into chaos, Serac gains control of Delos, changing Charlotte's plan; Maeve gets one last chance to stop Dolores; William starts his therapy.

Episodes.Name: Passed Pawn
Episodes.Description: Caleb gets an insight on the true nature of his past; Dolores seeks out Rehoboam's predecessor, while Maeve tracks her down; Bernard, Stubbs, and William escape from all the chaos.

Episodes.Name: Crisis Theory
Episodes.Description: Dolores' true intentions are revealed; Bernard confronts a ghost from his past; Maeve is conflicted; Serac's voice is dominant; Caleb's role is revealed; and William faces an unexpected villain.

Episodes.Name: The Auguries
Episodes.Description: Seven years after the demise of Rehoboam, events are set in motion that reunite allies and enemies.

Episodes.Name: Well Enough Alone
Episodes.Description: Maeve and Caleb search for answers. Christina investigates Peter Myers. William announces a new Delos venture.

Episodes.Name: Années Folles
Episodes.Description: Bernard begins his journey. Maeve finds herself in familiar territory. Caleb sees someone he loves.

Episodes.Name: Generation Loss
Episodes.Description: Maeve and Caleb attempt to escape Temperance with their lives. Bernard and the resistance search for a weapon in the desert.

Episodes.Name: Zhuangzi
Episodes.Description: Christina questions the nature of her reality. Charlotte tasks William with tracking a human outlier who has breached.

Episodes.Name: Fidelity
Episodes.Description: Caleb attempts to escape from Charlotte's brutal interrogation, and uncovers a disturbing reality. Bernard and C make their way to the resistance hideout, only to find a spy in their midst.

Episodes.Name: Metanoia
Episodes.Description: Bernard and Maeve fight to save the world. Charlotte begins to see her plans realized. The Man in Black returns to the game.

Episodes.Name: Que Será, Será
Episodes.Description: Christina finds the center of the maze; Caleb and C try to escape; William changes the game's difficulty, to Hale's furious disapproval.

Episodes.Name: The Gales
Episodes.Description: Tir Asleen receives an important delegation from Galladoorn, but a sudden attack by the mysterious Gales prompts Queen Sorsha to seek help from an old friend.

Episodes.Name: The High Aldwin
Episodes.Description: The Nelwyn villagers welcome the young adventurers sent by Queen Sorsha. Willow Ufgood, the High Aldwin, offers guidance as they continue their journey.

Episodes.Name: The Battle of the Slaughtered Lamb
Episodes.Description: The young heroes led by Willow are pursued by assassins who have been infected by dark magic.

Episodes.Name: The Whispers of Nockmaar
Episodes.Description: The journey leads the adventurers to seek refuge in the haunted castle of Nockmaar.

Episodes.Name: Wildwood
Episodes.Description: The enchanted fairy forest beckons, but is home to dangerous Bone Reavers.

Episodes.Name: Prisoners of Skellin
Episodes.Description: The heroes mount a rescue mission into the Dread Mines of Skellin.

Episodes.Name: Beyond the Shattered Sea
Episodes.Description: Our heroes finally reach the place where all maps end: the infinite expanse of the Shattered Sea.

Name: Willow
Summary: 20 years after vanquishing the wicked queen Bavmorda, the sorcerer Willow Ufgood leads a group of misfits on a dangerous rescue mission into the unknown.
